Aimi’s parents died in a tragic car crash
when she was 8.

Her 2 older sisters and older brother
after that moved in with family.
Well except her brother who moved in
with a family friend not unlike
Aimi had been taken in by Sasha.


The family survived in part thanks
to other family members in friends but
also off a settlement from the incident
that killed their parents and some savings
the kids didn’t know the parents had.



The will appointed a money manager trustee
to be paid
a modest fee out of the 24 point 93 mill
and make sure the Warner children lived frugally.
Instructions also gave said Trustee
Power over each child’s college fund which
2 other Aimi’s elder siblings had tapped.


Her big sister Sarah was in school currently
to become a doctor. It exceeded her college fund
fortunately Nancy their other sister
had offered up her excess funds seeing
as Nancy the eldest had went the cheaper route
of community college for beauty school.
She did hair, makeup and nails.
She wasn’t famous but
she did okay before meeting her husband
a doctor.


Aimi had also made the mature selfless
choice to
kick her college fund over to Sarah on
of all things
the promise that any future doctor care
Aimi needed would
be free on her so long as her studies and training
would allow.



Their brother Chris on the other hand was
going the entertainment route studying acting.
He didn’t plan to be super famous
but he did have reasonable ambition and goals
of small plays, and such.


Luckily some of Sasha’s neighbors were
particularly helpful too.

The Peterson’s and the Mossfield’s would
help with
some yard work, check in on Aimi and Sasha
and small stuff like that.
only Tina Peterson the bitchy teen next door
had a problem with Aimi.
She bullied her and excluded her from her clique.
Tina could never understand how they could allow a
14 year old to do police work especially one so
fashionably challenged, nerdy, short and plain.


Tina would make fun of some of Aimi’s
on camera news screwups like the
time Aimi slid on laundry detergent when
some thugs were ripping off the local
K-Mart and were only caught because
Aimi’s Klutz moment had knocked
several fishing poles down that tangled up
the bad guys.


The bad guys had intended to use
Aimi as an extra hostage against Sasha
and the police.


Anyway Dr. John Peterson had also
volunteered to be
Aimi’s primary care physician.
He had been friends with her parents for a
fair number of years and owed them in a few
ways including some bets
he lost but fully intended to make good on.


One such lost bet was that Aimi was gonna be
born Alex. Needless to say both John and
Timothy were shocked when Aimi was born.
Chris wasn’t exactly thrilled to have yet another girl
in the house either being the only boy besides his dad.
At that age for Chris it was like
“Yuck more cooties”


The Warner’s lived in a medium sized
often unheard of community.
Little Ridge, Alabama.
11331.title: Aimi’s incident - reserved -

113311.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...
————-

Aimi’s incredible new life story began 1
Faithful day helping Sasha.

Sasha had Aimi go under cover in a fake
“Teen idol contest” that was a front for
some very bad folks.


Sasha was about to catch them when
Aimi was taken hostage.
The bad guys tossed her in a large
big rig and began a high speed chase.


Inside the back of the truck was a
strange scientist working with the bad guys.
He was working on a strange looking
device.

“Well well I see that detective gave us
a test subject for the molecular transposer.

Well guess we can’t waste the opportunity!
You’re even all dressed up and ready to
be doll size”


Aimi stood up ready to run when
the truck jerked.
She slipped forward and bumped a couple
switches unnoticed.

The scientist quickly grabbed her.

“Not so fast you’re not allowed to
decline this scientific opportunity”

As he was going to wrestle her the
truck again jerked.
This time device fired a beam that
hit Aimi.

A strange energy fully enveloped her
clothes and all
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...

About a minute in though the machine
began to spark and smoke.

“Oh no my machine! Those fools reckless
driving has done something to my machine”


Suddenly the truck screeched you a halt.
The doors flew open.
Suddenly the sparking machine exploded.
The bad guys barely made a run/getaway


Aimi was thrown several feet and
nearly knocked unconscious.
Suddenly something round the size of a
gumball shot into her mouth.
She was forced to swallow nearly choking.
Seconds later her stomach felt unsettled.
Pain shot throughout her body and she
could’ve sworn a light shone out of her
mouth briefly as she screamed in agony.



Suddenly she couldn’t breath and she slipped into
unconsciousness.
Unknown to Aimi it was the mysterious
piece of meteor the good doctor used to power
his device.


Sasha had continued to pursue the bad guys
who had tricked her into thinking they still
had Aimi.


A lone car came down the otherwise empty
highway and spotted the aftermath.


It was an 17 year old that looked like a
football jock
however he was anything but.

He got on the phone fast and jumped the
highway barrier.


“Hello Tri County 9-1-1 whats your Emergency”


“Yes I’m out on highway Interstate 2033
and I came across a couple bad accidents.
There’s a semi truck on fire”


He was panicked then he spotted
Aimi. She was cute but looked slightly younger
than he himself.


“Ok calm down sir can you give us a location
or mile marker number?”


“I-I’m not sure it-it’s about 3 3/4 Miles from the
Garlinsburg exit. I I found a young girl on the
road unconscious. She’s blue and barely
breathing. I’m going to rush her to the hospital”


“Sir please we advise you don’t do that”

“I’m not letting her die damn it!
She looks like a middle or high school girl
and I know for a fact Emergency Services
are at least
25 Minutes away. The rain has stopped
and I know I can get her help faster.
Just please send help to the crash site”


He hung up and lifted up the girl.
She was remarkably light like 80 pounds maybe.
He put her in the back seat then
sped off.


16 Minutes later he arrived at the nearest hospital.
He rushed into the emergency department.

“Quick this girl she needs help”


“What happened?” Asked the medical staff
rushing to get her into a gurney.


“ I dunno everything. I was on the interstate.
there was no traffic then I came up to a wreck
a semi truck on fire and she was laying
in the road unconscious.
I called 9-1-1 and saw she was in critical condition
so I rushed her here”


“We’ll take it from here then.
The intake specialist will ask a few more questions”


A lady approached.
“Hi I’m Bethany the intake specialist.
I need to know as much info as you can give me.
Now then name”


“Uhh Michael... Michael Grail”


“Oh my god the Michael Grail? Like the inherited
Trillions youngest and richest person on the planet
Gail?”

“Uhh yea”


“Oh my gosh I’m sorry about your parents
but we will take extra good care of your girl friend.
That Erin K Gail wing of the medical center
has been a godsend”


“Uhh thanks but she’s not my uh err I
Mean I don’t really know I uhh..”


“Oh no don’t tell me you’re one of
those rich scandalous playboy types”

“It’s not like that I just saved her from the scene of an accident”

Suddenly in popped the local Sheriff.


“I’ll be damned that 9-1-1 dispatcher wasn’t crazy
We’ve been graced by the presence of a
member of the
Gail family the new family head no less!
You may not remember me but I’m
Sheriff Brigsby
Your mother helped expand our police department.
We are so glad to be one of the community’s your
family’s philanthropy has touched”



“ Oh hey yea I think mom and grandma brought
me to your policeman’s ball.”


“Yep they sure did. Boy have you grown in 7 years
but I’m sure your parents rest their souls
would be super proud of you now.
Anyway I heard you tried to save a girls
life. I swear you remind me of your mothers side of
the Gail family. It’s funny since your ma saved
your pops
life back in the day”


“Uhhh thanks”

Shiho's wish somehow comes true but not as expected.

Inside memory wise and mentality wise Shiho was still 5 years old but something felt.. Off..

30 feet tall and somehow in the backyard
11412.content:
Shiho's wish is somehow granted overnight but not as she expected and the once little girl wakes up the next morning to a surprise.

As she wakes up the 5 year old feels strange and like something is off.

She'll soon discover that while reality hasn't changed in the least she or rather her body has.


Shiho is now _____________


However, it soon becomes clear that her wish to be bigger has barely even started, as Shiho begins to grow, and grow, and grow, on and on and on...
Shiho'd never dream of harming anyone, but her growing size may well mean that accidents might become unavoidable...
11412.title: Bigger

114121.content:
As Shiho is waking up, she can feel something is off. Her legs are hanging over the edge if her bed, her feet touching the carpet. The only thing she can feel on her body is her blanket, which is now twisted around her overgrown body from how she tossed and turned all night.


         Sitting up, and still half asleep, she gets up out of bed, the blanket falling away from her unclothed body, a result of outgrowing her clothes during the night. She makes her way out of room and walks down the hallway to the bathroom. The moment she enters, she sees her reflection noticing that she is topless, and bottomless.



         Shiho instinctively covers herself when she finally notices it. She is taller. She looks at herself in the mirror, a bit confused. She is bigger, but she doesn't look any older. She looks down at her body confirming this with her own eyes.



         Shiho still can't help but smile, being bigger is good enough for her, she can be patient and wait until she grows up. She quickly relieves herself, before her bladder really becomes an urgent matter, the toilet feeling a bit small to her, before she heads back to her room.



         Lookong through her clothes, Shiho realizes a new problem that has occurred due to her new height. None of her clothes will fit her at six feet tall.
114121.title: She is a BIG girl noe

choices: She goes downstairs to show her mom how big she is
She grows again, her father's clothes getting tight on her.
She rushes to school oblivious that she’s growing again
Time skip- Growth spurts @ School! King size kindergartener too big for school
1141211.content:
"Uh-oh," Shiho says, frowning when she realizes that all of her clothes are too small for her. She stops to think, knowing that she can't just go naked. Her parents wpuldn't like that.



         "Mommy's and Daddy's clothes will fit me," Shiho says, leaving her room and heading for her parent's room.



         At first Shiho tries to put on some of her mother's clothes. Feeling tight and uncomfortable on her, she drops them to the floor before going through her father's clothes.



         Now wearing a pair of black sleep pants, which has a basset hound on on of the pant legs, and a blue shirt, Shiho looks at herself in the mirror. Though tbe clothes are the right size for her, they are baggy since they are meant fir the body of a grown man and not a little girl.



         "I'm as big as Daddy now," Shiho says, smiling.


         "Shiho, breakfast is ready," her mother calls. "You don't want to be late for your first day of kindergarden."



         The little girl smiles, she can't wait to show off how big she is.
1141211.title: A Big Problem

choices: Alice takes Shiho to the hospital
The sight of Shiho growing makes Alice faint
Alice just stands there in shock
11412111.content:
Shiho rushes downstairs, eager to showher mother how big she she. Once in the kitchen, she sees her mother, giggling at the height difference between them.



         Shiho's mother, Alice is unaware of her daughter's new size, ger focus on getting their plates together. The thirty-two year old woman still has a great figure, her black hair rwaching her hips. Her bright yelliw blouse and black slacks give her a casual look, her bare feet helping to complete it.



         "Mommy, look how big I am!" Shiho says excitedly, now standing behind her mother.



         "I can see," Alice says, not even bothering to look.



         "Mommy, look at me!" Shiho pleads. ""I'm bigger than you now."



         Alice finally turns around, stopping dead when she realizes that she is looking right at her daughter's neck. She looks up to see her daughter's smiling face, dropping the plates out of shock.



         "See, Mommy? I'm big now," Shiho repeats.



         "But, but how?" Alice asks, the only words she can even get out.



         "I made a wish last night, and I woke up big," Shiho explains.



         Alice just can't believe it. Kids don't just grow two and a half feet taller over night. Yet, her daughter has.


         "I feel funny," Shiho says, feeling her body stretch as she begins to grow. Her clothes are shifting on her body. Her shirt is rising up, becoming even tighter on her. Her pant legs are approaching her knees, the inseam being pulled up.



Her head is approaching the nine foot high ceiling, stopping the moment her head touches the ceiling. She looks down at her mother, who is eye level with her exposed stomach now.


"Am I too big now?"
11412111.title: Growing up fast

choices: Shiho grows only a little to 12 feet tall
Shiho grows 2x her size to 18 feet tall
114121111.content:
Alice panics.

“Dear heavens my little girl! We need to get you clothed and to the hospital fast”

“But I feel fine mommy” Shiho tried to counter but her mother wasn’t listening.

Alice rigged something together from a shower curtain and bed sheet making Shiho look like she was in an awkward hospital gown.
Alice then grabbed Shiho and led her outside.


Shiho still having been used to their mother child dynamic obediently let her mother pull her along.
They got stares but Alice was concerned with getting Shiho to a doctor.



Finally they made it to the hospital.The staff were shocked.
The doctors ran all kinds of tests and were baffled.


“What do you mean nothing seems to be wrong? Look at her! My little girl is like what? 9 feet tall at age 5”


“It like we said mam, medically and scientifically speaking there’s very few things we can determine other than somehow her body is adapting to these growth spurts you mentioned.
Normally the human body or any any living body has limits yet somehow her metabolism is staying the same, her muscles and bones and strength are increasing properly and proportionally allowing her body to support itself and based on her medical records she’s not only healthy as ever but as her size increases she somehow gets healthier. It defies all medical science”


“Are you sure all she did was make a wish?” Asks another Doctor.


“Yes so she says” replies Alice
“Are you sure you don’t remember everything” Asked Alice hopeful.


Shiho thought. “I just wished to grow up, to be big, very big”


Just then sparkles and a glow faintly surrounded Shiho briefly and then died out.


“I feel funny again” said Shiho.
Alice filled with dread.



Alice was right to dread.
The hospital staff were shocked as Shiho began growing even larger.
114121111.title: Alice takes Shiho to the hospital

choices: Alice gets Shiho something to eat
Shiho wants to get ber own food, lime a big girl
1141211112.content:
The makeshift clothes are shifting on Shiho's growing body. The wrinkles on the material being smoothed out it is being pulled taught on her. Her head is approaching the ceiling, bumping it when she gets a bit too tall. He clothes start to tear and tip a bit, getting too small for her. When her growth ends, her gown is extremely form fitting, the bottom barely covering her.



         Alice and the doctors can only watch as the giant girl moves to the floor, giving her enough room to sit up straight. Shiho just looks at them, a smile on her face as if what is happening to her is normal.


         "How is that normal?" Alice asks. "My little girl just doubled in height."


         "I never said what is happening to your daughter is normal," the doctor corrects. "But I will admit that I am a bit worried about what will happen if she does keep growing."


         Shiho is too busy looking around her smaller surroundings to hear what her mother and the doctor are talking about. She starts to mess with her short, rounded toes out of boredom. Her stomach then growls, the result of a skipped breakfast.


         Everyone looks at Shiho, who says, "Mommy, I'm hungry."
1141211112.title: Shiho grows 2x her size to 18 feet tall

choices: Run a test on her as she grows
Shiho grows again before they can move her
11412111121.content:
When Alice returns with a large pizza for her daughter she sees that Shiho is properly clothed as least as properly as possible. Her daughter is now wearing what looks like a couple of beds sheets. Each one wrapped around her like a top and skirt respectively. "Here you go," Alice says, giving her hungry dayghter the pizza.


         As Shiho is eating, Alice turns to look at the doctors. "So what now?"


         "First of all we need to get your daughter outside," the one doctor suggests. "Its obvious she is going to keep growing and for her to outgrow this building would be disastrous. Besides," the doctor points out, Shiho becoming a bit fidgety from the confined space. "she may decide to find her own way out if she gets too cramped."


         Shiho tries to stand up, bumping her head against the ceiling, debris fallimg on her. "Too small," she complains, trying to get more comfortable.


         "And she will just keep growing," the other doctor argues. "Look it might not be ideal but we may be able to find out exactly why she is growing and prevent any future growth. All we need to do is run some tests on her as she is growing. I can get all the equipment in here."
11412111121.title: BIG Problems

114121111211.content:
With how fidgety Shiho is being, and the not knowing how big she will get with her next growth spurt, Alice decides that it would be best to get Shiho outside.


         Getting Shiho out is difficult. Her large body can barely squeeze out through the examination room door. It takes the young girl a full 10 minutes to get out, her shoulder width causing the most problems. Getting to the exit is just as challenging the hallways not being designed for someone of such a large size even making turns is proving to be very difficult for her. Shiho is constanly bumping into things and people as she is crawling. At this point she is starting to see some of the problems her height and size is presenting.


         "The exit is straight ahead” the doctor points out, "Just a little bit farther."
114121111211.title: Playing it safe

choices: Tantrum! “NO I’M BIG AND I WANNA HAVE FUN”
1141211112111.content:
Luckily for Shiho, the exit doors are a lot more accommodating for her, allowing her to crawl outside with relative ease.


         Shiho is sitting in the front of the building, watching her mother talking to the doctor.


         "So now what?" Alice asks.


         "Not much that we can do except wait and hope that her height stabilizes,"the doctor says.


         "That's it?" Alice asks.



         Shiho's body glows for a brief moment once again. "Mommy, I feel funny again," she complains. Shiho is already growing again, her latest outfit already shrinking on her. The fabric is tightening around her body, becoming form fitting on her. Her head is rising up higher, approaching the second story windows.



         Alice and the doctors can only watch as the five year old is continuing to grow, the makeshift outfit starting to tear on her as it is becoming grossly undersized on her. Her shirt looks like a tube top and her skirt just barely reaches her knees. They all breath a sigh of relief when the now thirty foot tall girl stops growing.


         "Just wait?" Alice says, looking at the doctor. "And just how big will she be when her body decides to stop growing.



         Shiho is too busy looking around, seeing how small the world is starting to look to her. Getting bored she stands up, her head now level with the hospital's third story, and starts to wander off.


         Alice is watching as her daughter is starting to wander away. "Shiho, stay close," she shouts.
1141211112111.title: A Growing Girl Still

choices: Shiho grows to fifty feet tall
Shiho grows to a hundred feet tall
11412111121112.content:
Unfortunately, due to her large size, Shiho doesn't hear her mother. She continues to wander away from the hospital, only stopping when she comes across a busy road. Her mother always told her to never cross the street without a grown-up, ironic given her situation.



         Shiho stops to look at all the cars going. But it doesn't take long before they all slow to a stop, the sight of a thirty foot tall five year old grabbing everyone's attention. People start to get out of their cars, unable to believe what they are actually seeing.


         Shiho smiles and waves. "Hi everyone," she says in a cheerful tone. "I'm a big girl now." The irony of her last sentence is lost on her.


         All of a sudden, Shiho's body glows for a couple of seconds, the five year old frowning again when she begins to feel her entire body being stretched again. "I feel funny again," she complains,


         Everyone is watching with a mixture of amazement and shock as they are watching this "little" girl grow right before their eyes. Her makeshift clothes are shifting on her body as they are being pulled even tighter on her, shrinking on her growing body. The fabric is starting to tear from the strain of trying to stay on the growing girl's body.


         How big does Shiho get?

114121111211121.content:
Shiho’s makeshift clothes tear off her body, the ruined fabric falling at her sides.

Shiho looks down at herself, now seeing that she is completely naked as she stops growing.


“Uh-oh," the now fifty foot tall girl says.


         Shiho looks around, seeing how small everything is to her now. Most of the vehicles are now smaller than her feet. She begins to frown, realizing that everything is getting too small for her. She looks back the way she came, wondering if she should go back to her mother and the doctors. Then she looks down the road, thinking that she wants to go home.

114121111211121.title: Shiho grows to fifty feet tall

Police and military! Mommy says not to talk to strangers!
Nothing was approaching instead she was growing again w/Sounds now
1141211112111214.content:
Shiho looks around, fully aware of her clothing situation. "I'm naked. Gotta find some clothes," she says. With that she turns and starts to walk along the road, following it into town.




         Shiho can't help but look down at all the small cars that are practically parked on the road, unaware that they have all stopped because of her.



         The spectators can feel the vibrations that are being caused with each step she takes, watching as her large feet, which are larger than most of the cars go by.


         At her current height, Shiho makes it to a small town within minutes. She looks around, seeing how most of the two story houses don't even reach her hips.
She begins to glow for a couple of seconds, before she fels like she is being stretched out again, her body starting to grow.


         Her hips are rising up past the houses as her legs are lengthening. Her knees ate approaching the roofs, as her growth continues. The pavement below her starts to crack from her increasing weight. Her growth finally ends, putting her at about eighty feet tall.



         Shiho looks down, seeing how the houses are shorter than her knees. "Everything keeps getting smaller," she says. Her attention is grabbed by the sounds of something approaching.

( Edit Note: for the sounds option her growth has hit a point where her body actually creates sounds but also she can kind of hear the ground/pavement etc crack and shift under her size and weight )
1141211112111214.title: A Growing Situation

choices: Try to coax her to leave the car alone
Uh Oh Shiho is growing again!
11412111121112141.content:
Shiho looks up to see a helicopter approaching her. She stares at it out of curiosity as it is hovering.



         "This is as close as I am willing to get," the pilot tells the reporter.



         The blond haired reporter looks at the camera
which has both her and Shiho's face in the shot.


"This is Brittany Collins for Channel 5 News," she introduces herself.
"First on the scene where this giant girl has just wandered into a neighborhood." She looks back at Shiho who is smiling apparantly amused.



"Reports have been heard about a "little" girl who is about fifty feet tall, though she does seem to be bigger than that. She does not appear to be dangerous, but one can wonder what she will do."



         "Hello," Shiho says, waving.



          Britanny waves back at Shiho. She then grabs a megaphone, "Hello, what is your name?"


         "My name is Shiho," she answers.


         "Can you tell us why you are so big?" Britanny asks.


         Shiho shrugs her shoulders, "I don't know. I wished I was a big girl. But now I think I'm too big."


         "A wish?" Britanny mouths out of confusion. She then watches as Shiho picks up a car, as if it was a toy.


         "Toy car," Shiho says. She then sits down, breaking a fence as she sits in someone's yard, now rolling the car around.
11412111121112141.title: BIG News

choices: Shiho grabs another car to play with.
Shiho has  to go to the bathroom
Peoples reactions to Shiho from the news broadcast
114121111211121411.content:
Shiho is rolling the car along on the road, the wheels now spinning freely because of how the giant girl is forcing it along the road. She is unaware of how the vehicle's body is bent where she is holding it.


         "Should we try and stop her?" The pilot asks.


         "No," Britanny answers, watching as the eighty foot tall child is playing.



"This is perfect, stay focused on her." Britanny turns her mic back on as she continues to report.
"As you can see, even though Shiho is massive in size, she is still a sweet, innocent little girl. Playing with a vehicle like it is a toy.



         Shiho picks the car up, zooming it through the air, making plane noises as she does so. As she is playing, the vehicle slips from her grip and falls, landing in the road, upside-down. The sound of metal crunching and glass breaking can be heard.


"Uh-oh," she says looking down at the now ruined vehicle.


         The occupants of the helicopter watch with bated breath, waiting to see how Shiho is going to react. But instead, they see Shiho’s body glow for a second.


"Did you get that?" Brittany asks. They then watch as Shiho is starting to grow in front of their very eyes and on camera still.


         Shiho is starting to take up more room, her butt sinking into the ground a bit as her weight is increasing. Her one outstretched foot is being pushed into a house, breaking the wall as it is being pushed through.



After hitting a hundred and twenty feet tall, she stops growing. Shiho looks around, confused as to why everything got smaller again.

Shiho quickly grabs a parked truck,

The news copter from earlier had again tracked down
the unclothed giant child.


She seemed oblivious tho to that and her plight.
A couple minutes later Shiho attempted to move.


Something was wrong tho.
She couldn’t move.
Shiho attempted again to move her legs to no avail.


Shiho looked down then to her sides.
The awkward spot she had stopped in was
a plaza where 4 office towers were next to her.


Shiho’s growth was just enough that her hips
and buttocks were soundly wedged between the
4 corners of 4 of the best most sturdy built buildings
in a 1400 mile radius the owners sparing no expenses
and far exceeding regulations requirements
or any rational fortitude.


Shiho struggles again and wiggles but it’s no use.

The news copters are recording and the reporter that
interviewed Shiho earlier spoke.


“For the folks tuning in at home we caught up again
with the giant little girl identified earlier as Shiho.
As incredulous as it is the girl continues to grow.
Now however it appears the poor girl in
addition to her size plight and forced lack of
modesty has gotten herself stuck at the financial plaza.”


The camera showed Shiho’s grunts and struggles
yielding zero results.


Shiho frowned, realization beginning to sink in.
She made another failed attempt to free herself.

She was nearing the point of admitting defeat.
She flashed back to her earlier interview.
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...

“Too big”
she said.

1141211112113.content:
Luckily for Shiho, the exit doors are a lot more accommodating for her, allowing her to crawl outside with relative ease.


Shiho is sitting in the front of the building, watching her mother talking to the doctor.


"So now what?" Alice asks.


"Not much that we can do except wait and hope that her height stabilizes,"the doctor says.


"That's it?" Alice asks.



Shiho's body glows for a brief moment once again. "Mommy, I feel funny again," she complains. Shiho is already growing again, her latest outfit already shrinking on her. The fabric is tightening around her body, becoming form fitting on her. Her head is rising up higher, approaching the second story windows.



Alice and the doctors can only watch as the five year old is continuing to grow, the makeshift outfit starting to tear on her as it is becoming grossly undersized on her. Her shirt looks like a tube top and her skirt just barely reaches her knees. They all breath a sigh of relief when the now thirty foot tall girl stops growing.


"Just wait?" Alice says, looking at the doctor. "And just how big will she be when her body decides to stop growing.


Just then someone runs up to them.
“Hey we got that security footage from your home” says the guy.

He’s carrying a computer with a DVD in it.

“We found out what Shiho wished”

He plays the video.
It shows Shiho looking out her window sad then excited.
The moment of truth comes.

“I wish I was grown up, I wish I was big, I so big that no one in the universe could ever call me or treat me little ever again! I wish I was very big! I wish I was so big no one could call me a little kid”

“Good heavens why wasn’t she more careful with her wish” said a nurse.

“She’s just a child” countered another nurse.

“My heavens my little girl is never gonna stop growing is she” panics Alice looking at her 30
foot not so little girl.

Next...

Shiho's wish is somehow granted overnight but not as she expected and the once little girl wakes up the next morning to a surprise.

As she wakes up the 5 year old feels strange and like something is off.

She'll soon discover that while reality hasn't changed in the least she or rather her body has.


Shiho is now _____________ .

Mentally and emotionally she's still 5 years old and seems to be done aging for now....

However, it soon becomes clear that her wish to be bigger has barely even started, as Shiho begins to grow, and grow, and grow, on and on and on...
Shiho'd never dream of harming anyone, but her growing size may well mean that accidents might become unavoidable...

114211.content:
Matt's sister is only 2, making her quite the handful as a toddler. shes always been mischievous and playful...and kind of mean Matt just wishes she could grow up and be more mature, though she was just a toddler.



However one faithful day while he was home alone, (watching Sara of course) hear a knock at the door, he cautiously answered it seeing as he was only 17 and heaven forbid it was some sorts of sales person or mail delivery that his parents had to sign.



oddly enough it was a cloaked figure at the door, it was 7:00 PM so this was odd to see anybody at this door. Matt asked what the man in the cloak wanted or.. at least he though it was a male, he couldn't tell under the cloak.



However instead of an answer, the cloaked figure hands you an amulet... odd but you accept it as to not be mean, and in a raspy voice the cloaked figure says in a raspy voice, still unable to tell the gender of this person "Careful what thou wishes for boy, take it seriously" And with that the figure walked off into the falling darkness.



You snicker at the thought, closing the door, and you begin to inspect the amulet, on the back it was inscribed with, " One Wish, Make it and hold the amulet forward" you laugh again thinking its some kind of joke, but you decide to humor it, and you make a wish.

114222.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful and normal day in Metropolis. Kevin and Krypto were watching his little sister Melanie. The two of them had decided to take the toddler to the park near Lex-Corp Towers.



Melanie began to play in the sandbox.


Meanwhile inside Lex-Corp Ignacious Alex's pet Iguana/Lizard was in 1 of the science labs eating his usual snacks. The staff were out of the office.


Soon Ignacious became cross.

"Blech I'm sick of the same old freeze dried crickets. I need some variety in my diet." He huffed. He then easily got out of his tank.


Ignacious began looking out Lex's telescope then he spotted a caterpillar on a tree branch of a tree not far from Melanie and the sand box.


"Ooo yummy a different kind of dinner but a little small. Hmm I bet that growth Ray ol Lex made would make it into a full course meal"


With that Ignacious headed over to a large laser device.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/72...

Without looking Ignacious hastily climbed on and moved the devices aim to out the window without looking. He accidentally fired off a shot.

The beam traveled out the window however was locked onto another target.

Kevin and Krypto were distracted by Kevin's friend slash crush Andrea.
The beam struck none other than Melanie who was building a sandcastle.


( next/cont I wasn't gonna split this into 2 but this has possibilities so.., )
114222.title: Melanie Scenario 2 BIG Sister Saga - Sisterly G...

1142222.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/82...

Melanie didn't even notice.
Ignacious then adjusted the scopes sight onto the caterpillar but didn't realize the aim was separate and still on Melanie.


He pressed fire. The beam struck Melanie again.
This time she felt something but didn't notice the beam.

"Huh something tickle me" she said stopping her castle building in the sandbox.

Meanwhile Ignacious was getting annoyed.

"Hey why isn't this thing working? Let's try again"


This time he fired longer.
This time Melanie also noticed something more.

"Huh pretty light feel good"

Iggy on the other hand was noticing nothin happening.


"Hey it's not doing anything? Wait a minute the aim is off! If I'm not firing up lunch then what am I doing?"
He adjusted the viewfinder to where the beams aim was.

"Uh oh old Lex ain't gonna like this! I hope the kid don't grow much"
Finally he stopped firing.

He watched the results.

"Aww pretty light go bye" whined Melanie


"Phew it doesn't seem to affect people. Now to just play innocent "

With that he slank off.


Meanwhile Kevin stopped drilling over his crush.
He decided it was time to go back home.

"Ok Melanie time to go home"

With that he and Krypto walked her home.

1151.content:
Dr. Vockorov was your typical German-America scientist once upon a time.
A top researcher in genetics, metabolics and certain other medical fields.




His work was so good and promising that it wasn't a huge surprise when the government enlisted him for a few years. Unfortunately some research had hit a snag and the government decided to shut him down and consficate his research. Now Dr. Vockorov was by no means violent however the stresses under the military watch and them taking large portions of his work had driven him mad.



He did reconstruction on himself to be unrecognized when he fled government custody after being
"Temporarily placed on inactive civilian duty"




It seemed his disguise was working.
The mad Doctor continued his research in secret claiming it was for the good of man but his work secretly was laced with malice, oh how he wanted to get those army and governmental beuracratic imbeciles back. Sure his research had setbacks and risks, sure there were questions of ethics and most of all yes finding suitable willing test subjects may of been unfruitful but those fools could of at least tried his idea to lie and trick the test subjects.



To him it was not that much different than placebo use and besides he was desperate. He knew all too well what happened in this top secret group if a government scientist doesn't perform, deliver results or worse totally displeases them.



In secret the doctor had finally perfected "it" the results of much work or so he thought.

At the last the _______________________
was ready for testing even if it had to be an unwilling unsuspecting victim.

To him it was not that much different than placebo use and besides he was desperate. He knew all too well what happened in this top secret group if a government scientist doesn't perform, deliver results or worse totally displeases them.



In secret the doctor had finally perfected "it" the results of much work or so he thought.

At the last the enlarger as they had dubbed it
was ready for testing even if it had to be an unwilling unsuspecting victim.


But who is the victim or what happens next. The doctor goes out in search of a victim out of desperation.


Their reasons were mixed and not always clear but the device had been designed to enlarge only females. Some of the research team being pervy and others reasoning it would be supposedly easier to control the "enlargee" the ideal perimeters for subjects was girls ages 14 and younger
15 or 16 tops as a last resort.


On his search he decided to go to a small queit town a fair distance from the city and the lab.
Thankfully it wasn't too small as he got hungry near the end of his drive.
He decided to stop at one of those attempts at a modern drive thru slash drive in called Sonic


There was also a place to sit and eat. He decided to do so taking the Enlarger with him. There were some targets here or he could wait till after his meal and check out more of the town.

11515.content:
Kimiko was already an accomplished
Lab assistant at the age of 16 with
real promise. She hadn’t always been
this smart though.
Kimiko was a Japanese-Asian girl.


One day however testing things at her
lab would set about a life altering chain of
events.


A beaker with an experimental youth serum
busted and splashed all over the teen.
In mere minutes the serum worked reverting
Kimiko in age from 16 back to
where she could still walk and talk
but also would be young enough to be
pushed in a stroller and just finished
potty training.
( somewhere between 3 or 4 )


Kimiko panicked and once the physical part
part of the transformation completed could
feel her mind slipping next.

She struggled to focus and grabbed a beaker
of experimental growth serum.
Alas her mind had reverted almost completely
now as another assistant comes in.


She quickly realizes what happened as
the now regressed Kimiko speaks.

“Make biggah again” she said holding the
beaker.


The assistant noticed Kimiko had cut herself
but knew what to do.
She grabbed Kimiko some little girl clothes
and put Kimiko inside a pod like chamber.


The assistant then hooked the beaker into
the machines liquid intake.
She failed to check the contents fully
only noting the word “growth“

She activated the machine then called the
head scientist to inform him and write an
accident report.

Inside the pod like chamber the growth serum
gets turned into a vapor like mist and
Kimiko inhales it all.

40 minutes later the other assistant and
Doctor Jones come to find Kimiko
healed but oddly still a child though somethin
seemed slightly different to the assistant.


She shrugged it off and opened the pod to
find Kimiko sucking her thumb cutely.


“Where mommy” she asks.

The assistant tries to console her
but fails apparently not being good with
children.

“Don’t worry Kimiko everything will be
all right”


Kimiko doesn’t trust her.
She gets frightened and runs off
unaware of what was going to happen.


She sneaks out of the facility and onto
public streets.
She soon finds a house with the door open
and goes in.

Inside Kimiko finds some snacks and starts
eating however in a few minutes she
begins to feel strange.


She feels dizzy, and sore and gets a headache
and then she stumbles into a bedroom.
Suddenly her clothes begin to feel tighter.


Kimiko is confused as the changes take
place but soon the tightness distracts her
as it’s getting to be a bit much.


Then as whatever was happening continued
her clothes began to tear.

Minutes later an embarrassed Kimiko
stopped undergoing changes and knew
she had to deal with the sudden draft.


As luck would have it she found clothes for
a child easily 2 or 3 times her age.


Kimiko got dressed with some difficulty
and hasn’t realized yet she’s gone through
2 growth spurts and now looked too tall
for her age or what her face and features
conveyed.


Kimiko then began to suck her thumb as
she pondered what to do next and why
strange things seemed to be happening to her.


She then remembered she needed to
stay away from the strange lady and man
in the strange place and maybe find her
mommy.


Sadly Kimiko’s memories gone and with
the age regression she’s unaware
she’s an orphan her mom having
died when she was 14 the 1st time.

His motives still unclear to the limited number of people involved it was still a marvel.

115321.content:
Based off
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/ci...
---------/---//---//---/-------/-----------/-------/----//--------/-------/- ----/--


18 year-old Maya comes home from work one day from her job as a waitress exhausted and tired, heading back to the house she takes care of while her parents are away during long periods of work. What she doesn't know, though, is that she is also carrying in her purse a little bottle of perfume given to her by one of the people she waited on. She was told that whoever smells it would change before their eyes. Maya, not believing in that sort of stuff, leaves it on the top of her bureau in her bedroom. Will Maya eventually check it out again, or will one of her little sisters stumble onto it instead?

Bios of the three sisters:

Name: Maya
Age: 18
Height: 4'11"
Hair color/length: Short, brown
Eye color: Brown
Description: A short, slight clumsy girl who works as a waitress to pay her way through college. She's always smiling and willing to help others, though she resents her tiny, flat body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...


Name: Aya
Age: 15
Height: 5'6"
Hair color/length: Long, black in twin braids
Eye color: Green
Description: A tall, pretty, popular girl in her first year of high school, Aya also gets really good grades. She wishes for a boyfriend, but wants one that's interested in her mind and not in her curvy body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...


Name: Saya
Aget: 8
Height: 3'10"
Hair color/length: Dirty blonde, down to the middle of her back
Eye color: Blue
Description: A petite, adorable little girl, Saya is the youngest sibling in her family. She wears a big ribbon in her hair, a gift that Aya gave to her when she was 5. She also carries around with her a stuffed animal, a gift from her oldest sister Maya. She loves her sisters very much, but is shy around other kids her age.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...

1153211.content:
Maya came home from a long day at work. She quickly headed up the stairs and changed, changing into a
black t-shirt and jean shorts. As she changed, she remembered the quartet of perfume bottles a customer had given her earlier. They had no name or stickers on them, but the person, an old man, told her that one just one spray would change her or the target greatly.


Each bottle of perfume was quite big and had a different color.
There was Pink, Blue, Green and Yellow.


"Yeah right", Maya scoffed at the perfume bottles as she left them on her bureau. She then went downstairs to watch some T.V.


But in a house with three siblings, word gets out fast about stuff you see lying around. It just so happened that Maya's sisters overheard their eldest sister talking about the perfumes.


They were curious about the description Maya mentioned and blew off.


Perhaps one of them would spray one of perfumes onto themselves, or would Maya herself take back what she said earlier and do so instead?

11532113321.content:
**credit to a User named rain man from this story https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

--------/-----------/-----------/--------/-------/---------/-----/

"Now who could that be?" Aya said as the door continued to be knocked. Aya tried to get up only to fall back down. Aya frowned and mumbled as Saya giggled.


"I'll get it!" Saya said as she ran to the front door. Aya heard Saya drag a chair and stood on top of it. Saya peered through the peephole then went back down and pushed the chair back to its place. The door had a chain look so Saya could only open it a bit.


"Who is it, Saya?" Aya asked as she finally got up. She slowly made her way to the door but hid behind it.

"It's Mrs. Freed." Saya said as Aya peered through the door. There she saw a mid-30s woman with her auburn hair in a Bob cut. She seemed to carry a two-year old girl who had long brown hair and a white dress.


"Oh hey, Aya!" Mrs. Freed said as she smiled. The child seemed asleep.


"Hey Mrs. Freed. What are you doing at this hour?" Aya asked as Saya stood at her side looking at her older sister then at Mrs. Freed.

"I heard you were free for babysitting so I was asking if you could babysit Sandra for me." Mrs. Freed said as if she was a pleading.


"What seems to be the problem, Mrs. Freed?" Aya asked as she seemed concerned.


"A family emergency. My husband is already there and I need to follow soon. I'll be back by Sunday evening." She said as she cradled her the child.


"Who's that?" Saya asked as she pointed to the child that Mrs. Freed was carrying.


"Oh this is Sandy." Mrs. Freed said.


"No problem. Seems you really need a babysitter." Aya said as she smiled. Saya looked up at her sister.



"Oh you are a godsend. Here are her things." Mrs. Freed said as Saya took the bag and set it in the living room. Mrs. Freed handed Sandy to Saya as she carried her to Aya's room. She seemed to struggle but managed to make it. Aya and Mrs. Freed exchanged numbers and soon she was gone. Aya closed the door and leaned on it.


"Phew! That was close! I thought I was going to get caught " Aya thought as she locked the door and slowly went up stairs to her room where Saya and Sandy were. Sandy was asleep on her bed with Saya at her side.



Aya went pale as she saw Saya with the perfume in hand. She had timed it perfectly as she saw she had squirted the sleeping Sandy with the perfume.


"Saya! What are you doing? Are you crazy!" Aya yelled as she walked as fast as she could and sat on her bed.


"Well. I wanted to see if the perfume was for real. So I wanted to try it out." Saya said as she placed the perfume on Aya's lamp table.


"Who knows what the perfume will do! You shouldn't play things you don't know nothing about! Even I don't know what it actually does!" Aya scolded Saya as Saya looked down.


"Great. What are you going to do now?" Aya thought as she looked at Sandy then at the perfume.
11532113321.title: Mrs Freed + 2 year old Sandy

Wendy grows older ( no mental changes )
11532113322.content:
**credit to a User named rain man from this story https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

--------/-----------/-----------/--------/-------/---------/-----/

Aya had just finished her lunch as she cleaned up the plates and brought them to the dish washer. As the dishwasher did its thing, Aya leaned on the counter and folded her arms beneath her bust.


Just then the door bell rang.
Startled she check her phone which was in her pocket for messages but had none.


"Now who could this be?" Aya thought as she made her way to the front door. Peeking through, the peephole. She saw a middle age woman with long brown curly hair. She was wearing a business suit as she repeatedly check her cellphone. Aya recogznied her as Mindy. The woman who used to babysit them. Aya slowly opened the door as she hid behind it.


"Hey! Mindy! What brings you here?" Aya asked nervously as she waved. Mindy smiled while waving back.


"Big favor to ask you." Mindy said as she clasped her hands together in a pleading manner.


"Sure, what is it?" Aya asked in a puzzled way.


"I need you to babysit these two." Mindy said as a little boy and girl popped for behind Mindy. Both were brown haired with blue eyes but the girl had pigtails. She recognized them as Saya's classmates.


"Ummm.. Saya isn't here. She went with Aya to work." Aya said. "But it's not a problem with me!"


"Oh you are a god send! I'll be back tomorrow after noon. I have an out of town meeting and didn't have time to find a babysitter. Oh by the way these aren't mind, they're my niece and nephew, twins actually." Mindy said as she blushed.


"Like I said, it's not a problem!" Aya said. Mindy kissed the two on the forehead and explained what she was doing. Mindy them left as Aya closed the door. She leaned her back on it.


"Phew! That was a close. If she saw me as I am now, I wouldn't know how to explain." Aya thought as the two caught her attention. She knew what they were staring at. It was her belly.


"S-so, you guys had a snack yet? I could fix one up if your hungry." Aya asked nervously. The boy's name was Wally while the girls was Wendy.


"Why is you belly so big?" Asked Wendy as she bit her left index finger, twisting her right ankle in a cute way.

"Uh, school project. That's it a school project!" Aya said nervously as the two looked at each other.


"I thought you were fat or something." Wally said as he raised his arm behind his head.

"I hope they bought my lie." Aya thought as she lead them into the living room. Saya already had her toys there as they played with them. Aya made them some snacks as she placed them on the living room table. Aya watched TV with them as time began stroll quickly.


Aya had dozed off a she rubbed her eyes. She fixed her glasses to find the two missing. Puzzled she looked around.


"Weird. Where those two go? The toys are here and they know they aren't supposed to go out." Aya thought as she saw it was evening. Looking at the clock, it read 6:30. She slowly got up and went to the backyard.


"Not here." Aya thought. "Oh crap! I hope they didn't find the perfume!" As she ran as fast as she could, up the stairs and into Saya's room. Panting she saw that Wally had just sprayed Wendy who was making faces at the smell it created. Aya stomped towards them at snatched the perfume from Wally.


"Are you crazy? Don't you know it's wrong to use others things without permission?" Aya said scolding the two. She looked at the perfume.

"Sorry... We thought it was Saya's so we tried it." Wally said as he began to sniff. Tears welling up but Wendy was already crying.


"Okay, okay. Calm down.. Just how many time did you spray her?" Aya asked nervously. The twins looked at each other.

"Two... maybe 3 times..." Wendy said rubbing her eyes. Aya rubbed her head.


"Great, just what are you going to do to them now?" Aya thought looking at the perfume as she leaned on the two who looked at her.

Wendy was around Sara's age before the earlier incident.
11532113322.title: Mindy + the twins

choices: Ben started growing in spurts! BIG BEN!
115321133231.content:
**credit to user rainman from https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

-------/___---/------/-----------/--------/---------/-------/-------/-----/- ----:/-------/----/--------/


It was around 5:30 PM on a Friday as the doorbell rang. Aya went to the door and peeked through the peephole. There she saw a familiar face.


"Mrs. Fairchild?" Aya said as she opened the door. With a smile, when greeted Mrs. Fairchild. She was at least a thirty something business woman who lived next door. She had wavy brown hair that extended last her ears. Good friends with them since they could remember. She saw she had a two year old boy she was carrying.


"Hey, Aya. I need a favor." Mrs. Fairchild said. As Aya started to play with the tyke. The tyke giggled.


"What is it?" Aya asked.


"I was wondering if you could babysit my little boy, Ben. I have to be somewhere." Mrs. Fairchild said.


"Oh no problem! Just how long will you be gone?" Aya asked as Mrs. Fairchild was overjoyed.


"Till Sunday evening." Mrs. Fairchild said. She explained somethings to Aya about Ben. She handed Aya some money and a bag full of his clothes.


"Take care of yourself, Mrs. Fairchild! Saya is going to love him." Aya said as she waved. Mrs. Fairchild waved back as she got into a taxi. Aya closed the door and went to Saya's room where she saw them playing.


It wasn't after dinner Ben was throwing tantrums. Saya and Aya tried to call him down even after what Mrs. Fairchild told her.


"Talk about a brat.." Aya said as Saya ran out of her room. He kept throwing fist and shouting until Aya saw Saya brought something familiar.


"Saya! Why did you bring that!" Aya said scolding Saya. It was the perfume! Before Aya could get it, Saya handed it to Ben who stopped crying. He looked at it with curiosity.


"See? He stopped crying!" Saya said with her achievement but Aya was different.


"I just hope he doesn't spary something." Aya said as she looked nervously. Then he sprayed...Himself a few times.

As Aya's eyes went wide with fright. Ben first sneezed and cried due to the smell. Saya grabbed the perfume before he could throw if.

"I wonder how the perfume is going to affect him..." Aya thought as she carried him. Still crying..

1153321.content:
So somehow an alien virus makes its way to earth
Now who falls victim and how?

-----------

Emily was you average 7 year old til one day some space debris changes that.
Thanks to some kids carelessness she's exposed to an alien virus
Soon she starts exhibiting symptoms of being sick
She then notices she's growing up in forced and and painful spurts
At first her and those that know just think it's height but it becomes apparent it's age too
The odd part she stops growing at age 14


Just when they think it's stopped as if sudden puberty weren't enough for her 7 year old mind
She starts growing again only this time it's only in height.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...

If a cure isn't found Emily might just outgrow more than her clothes if she survives


----------

Anne
Was your typical 8 year old girl until a field trip ended in mayhem
Her friends dared her into a lab they had no business in
Inside a beaker left on a bunsen burner burst
Anne tried to clean it up and cut herself
The strange contents absorbed into her cut within seconds and oddly it healed itself
They left uncaught and unscathed or so they though


Less than a day after her field trip Anne comes down with a mild fever
But the strange part soon shows
Her hair turns silver.
And she begins having growth spurts anytime
She sneezes, feels embarrassed, feels self conscious or in auto response/defense to bring injured or her body subconsciously feeling threatened.

A look in her bedroom mirror at the changes she soon undergoes doesn't help
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...
1153321.title: Space virus options ( reserved )

choices: Time skip. Symptoms worse and growth noticed for the 1st time
11533211.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...
-------

One day Emily was playing with a group of local kids.
Unfortunately among this group were a couple of bullies.
The bullies were plotting how to mess with the girls when they all spotted something in the sky.
Tiny meteor chunks were raining down.
One not so tiny thing to fall was some odd capsule containing a mysterious liquid.


The glass container cracked on impact then shattered spilling its contents into a puddle.
As the rain of space debris stopped the kids go to get a closer look.


It was then that the head bully made his move.

"Wow what is it" Emily questions


"Here why don't you find out for us" said Tim
He then pushed her face 1st into the puddle


Emily flailed a bit involuntary ingesting dirt and the strange substance.
Faster than expected she stopped moving.


"Uhh Emily you ok? Come on I was just messing. This isn't funny"
The bullies started to panic

"Dam it Tim you went too far now we're all gonna be in so much trouble" said Jacob another boy.


"No we aren't we're gonna run like hell and pretend this never happened! Anyone squeals and you answer to me" said Tim. With that the boys ran.


The girls soon found Emily unresponsive.
The entire contents of the container except a few drops inside the unshattered portion had been ingested by Emily.
The girls ran for help.


A few moments later Emily sprung back to life.
The reprieve was short lived as she began to sweat profusely.
A small pain formed in her chest and her breathing became labored and heavy.
She also felt strange. It lasted for about a minute then stopped.


As the girls and a parent returned they were relieved to find her conscious.
They were however concerned about her sweating and heavy breathing.
They checked her forehead and found she felt a bit warm.


Picking Emily up no one seemed to notice the girl had gained 3 inches in height as they took her for care.
Little did anyone know Emily would keep on having growth spurts and the pains would eventually get worse
11533211.title: Emily's growing pains

choices: Uh Oh the lab caught the students red handed.
11533212.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...

------

Anne was your typical 8 year old elementary student and once had brown hair and blue eyes.
One day her school went on a not so typical field trip of a science facility.


Her friends Tanya, Liz and Sam convinced her to sneak away from the "thrills" of plant algae that can be used as toilet cleanser that's inviromentally friendly.
They find an empty lab with some chemicals apparently being studied.



They spot a beaker left on a burner. Emily moves to turn it off when it bursts.
The goo inside oddly somehow contained the mess to the table.



Anne moves to clean it up when she cuts herself.
"Owww I cut my finger"


"Yea yea just hurry up" says Tanya.

A few drops of blood hit the gel like substance.
Neither of them noticed it flash from its green goo to red to orange then back to green.
Anne resumes cleaning it despite her cut somehow oblivious that her bleeding stopped and her cut is absorbing the goo.



Within moments she sees it gone and assumed it dried up. As they leave Anne notices her cut is now healed and pain free. Shrugging it off she rejoined her class.
They all thought nothing of the incident but 12 hours later the next morning their 4 day weekend would kick off to an interesting start at Anne's home as she developed a mild fever.


During the night her hair changes color to a silvery white and her eyes go from blue to
a unique blue green mix.
11533212.title: Anne's affliction

115332131.content:
Lisa's father was an astronaut.
She was sick however on him often working.
One day when she's taken to work she decided to sneak aboard and stowaway on her fathers shuttle.


The space shuttle launches and the short mission seems to go well until a meteor shower strikes.
The ship survived mostly but one busts into the side of their craft.
The object breaks into the supply room Lisa was hidden in.


The good news is the piece plugged the hole it created,
The bad news a strange gas filled the room which Lisa breathed in.


The craft returned to earth and Lisa managed to sneak out.
The space program staff would soon examine and repair the ship.
For now all remain unaware of what happened to Lisa


Later that night as she slept her body glowed briefly and she gained 3 inches in height.
Still unaware she went to school.


At about this time the scientists had mad a startling discovery about the meteorite piece.
Inside they found a gas that contained an airborne virus.
The alien virus wouldn't be so bad except it appeared that exposure to earths atomosphere caused the viral cells to enlarge in size the longer they're exposed.


Later toward the end of school she had a fainting spell
The students rather than help played a prank by drawing on her.
Just after they left her body glowed briefly and she had another growth spurt.


This time gaining 5 extra inches on top of her prior boost

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/79...

She started to stir noticing her clothes were a bit tighter and then the drawing on her belly.
Figuring the tighter clothes were part of the prank Lisa got up and went to clean off.


On the way home home Lisa glowed again and started to feel strange.

"Ehh w-what's happening to me"

Suddenly her answer came when her body had its 3rd spurt.



Her body increased evenly in size as she grew in height. Her clothes started feeling noticeably tighter. This time she put on 11 inches in height.



The growth spurt came to an end.
Lisa was in shock

"Oh my god what's happening?! I gotta get home"


With that she rushes home.
Meanwhile at the space center lab another development struck.


"General sir we have a problem! Mister Bennett might want to see this as well" said a scientist urgently.


The general and Lisa's dad followed.


"What is it that's so urgent civilian" said the general as they approached a console.


"Well general sir you had us going over security footage in and around the shuttle and we have a small but potentially big problem" began the scientist.


"Out with it already son" ordered the general.



"Well you see when we thought Bennett's daughter had met her escort ride on time it turns out we were mistaken. She gave her ride the slip and snuck aboard the shuttle but that's not the worst of it. We have evidence Lisa Bennett was exposed to the virus. We don't know how much or what the effects will be but we imagine not good sir"



"Great Washington's ghost what was your daughter thinking Bennett? We have to handle this immediately"

A large ship approached Earth. Of course It was small as such things go.
By Earth standards, just about 3 miles long. It was Specially built to hide
from a pre-FTL or an underdeveloped civilization. The purpose was to allow tourists
to peak in on anything that most interested them on a primitive world.
It was illegal to interfere with such a Planet, but the Galaxy was huge and
officials were easy to bribe.
A most common Teaser Theme as they were known, was to fire
a size-changing ray on a small area or a creature and see what happens.
Why? Because it was fun for aliens and they could just erase minds afterwards if needed.
The ship, given the size of the tourists, had room for about a classroom or 2 or 3 full;
equipped with workstations for a tourist to focus on whatever they want to see.


It was definitely against Galactic Law to remove a primitive from their homeworld, but again the owner of such a ship could afford a bribe, if it was even needed.


The alien visitors invisible to Earth’s inhabitants descended and searched for a target.
They had decided today on observing pranking by way of
the enlarging ray.


They hover above...

115332341.content:
An Alien race has decided to systematically
destroy planets and more.
Their plan is BIG in many ways!



A strange ship approaches earth.
On the ship in darkness the aliens converse.

“We’ve arrived your excellency”

“Perfect”

“Are you sure about the plan oh exhaulted one”


“Yes operation Gigastruction perfect and
best of all the unsuspecting Earthling that
helps carry out our plans will have no choice
thanks to the professors creation right
Professor Vom Snock”


“Yes thanks to the power of the element
I created called Enlargium. If ingested by the
right candidate the chosen earthlings digestive
and metabolic systems will do the rest.
The element will self replicate in the humans
System causing the human to undergo
random growth spurts.


The human will continue to have these
growth spurts until we either cure them
kill them or reverse the condition.
Furthermore at certain sizes the human
May find new abilities at their disposal and
will be forced to adapt to their size.


Lastly rather or not they want to eventually
The human will start causing the destruction we
seek simply by being big and growing bigger.
Eventually they’ll outgrow planets giving us the
most effective destruction.


Now then let’s choose a Target”


“I leave it to you professor! Give us a show”

with the Enlargium that contains cell sized
shards of the element. The formula is designed
in such a way that I put it in this baby bottle.
When introduced into the body of a human
who hasn’t reached their full maturity or natural
growth cycle like say a human child the serum
and micro Enlargium shards will enter the
bloodstream and bond with certain cells
in the body. From there the shards will
self replicate causing the child to experience
growth spurts.


The formula will also enhance any nutrition
intake by the child so as to sustain both the
growth and the child’s body throughout all
stages of enlarging.
Now to find a target.”

Time skip! Emily’s growth unnoticed until the next morning at daycare
1153323412.content:
On Earth a little 3 year old girl named Emily
Was playing ball in her yard.
She’s a sweet girl and she was being babysat
by her usual babysitter Jenn and her friend
slash occasional babysitter Ron.



It looks like her mother dressed her in
a fully body white dress ending a skirt.

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...


Jenn and Ron were distracted for the time
being but were confident Emily was safe.
Which was true enough however neither noticed
Emily get distracted.

A jar of strange glowing candy rolled next to her.
Naturally Emily did what any young child would
when seeing free candy.


Emily grabs the jar and easily gets the lid
off to her glee.
She begins eating the candy and as there wasn’t
a lot she finishes it in a matter of minutes.


Emily’s body glows briefly but the glow fades
for now.

Meanwhile on the now invisible alien ship:

“It is done my liege! An earth child was easily
tricked into eating the earth candy with
powdered Enlargium mixed then coated
throughly in highly concentrated liquid
Enlargium to boot”


To emphasize that point Emily was licking
her now sticky and green juice covered
fingers clean.


“Excellent job! Now then tell me more”

“It’s simple my lord. As explained before
Now that the foolish earth child has
ingested the candy the digestive
and metabolic systems will do the rest.
The element will absorb into her body
and self replicate in the humans
System causing the human to undergo
random growth spurts.


The human will continue to have these
growth spurts until we either cure them
kill them or reverse the condition.
Furthermore at certain sizes the human
May find new abilities at their disposal and
will be forced to adapt to their size.


Lastly rather or not they want to eventually
The human will start causing the destruction we
seek simply by being big and growing bigger.
Eventually they’ll outgrow planets giving us the
most effective destruction.


It is an ingenious plan and we shall all
be in for quite the show”
1153323412.title: The little girl and the candy that is Enlargium

1/?

Here’s what this story will be called and
the premise.


“The “Little” girl problem”

A little girl age 3 to 6 ( more age options later )
Gets either kidnapped by scientists or abducted
by aliens. They don’t necessarily hurt or harm
her but they do experiments on her.

During her captivity either by accident and
Unexpectedly either the experiment enlarges
her or she gets free in their testing facility
and winds up unintentionally encountering
something that makes her grow be it a size ray
a growth serum she spills on herself or mistakes
as a drink or strange alien food that reacts
unexpectedly.


Either way despite the cause and even
the best most meek demeanor
( reader chooses personality as long as it’s
not inherently super evil )
Now the girls captors have to deal with a
child bigger than a house
( 80 feet tall ) to as big as Godzilla or a skyscraper
with the potential to get bigger still.
Either way things just got more complicated
for her alien or scientist abductors.

11533234555555551.content:
Tim was an average nerdy Teen with an
average life till 1 day he got a lamp complete
with magic genie and 3 wishes.

He could only think of 1.
A few days later he saw a local neighborhood
kid, a preschool girl around 4 or 5 y/o getting
bullied by some boys around 8 or 9
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...

“Please just let me alone
I gots to go potty”

“Aww is the shrimp gonna wet herself”


Tim’s blood boiled and he acted without
thinking, the genie still with him.

“I wish that little girl were big enough that those
brats wouldn’t dare pick on her”

As the boys pushed her down she wet
herself.
She felt strange but brushed it off as she
was starting to cry.


“Aww did the whittle baby have an
accident?”
One boy chided then pulled her up by her
hair.

He stopped and noticed something strange
and started backing away.
The other boys didn’t notice as the
girl stood there.
They were too into the bully fest.

“What’s wrong Mark why you scared of a
little weak shri....

He stopped noticing the girl was now
as tall as them and seemed to be getting bigger.

“Why are you all turning cowards”
Said a 3rd

He walked up to her and then turned
pale.
She quickly grew to twice their size and then
some.

8 feet tall to be exact.

She was still crying and fearful and
didn’t notice the role reversal that occurred.

The last boy was semi brave.
“Wimps just do this then run”
He said then knocked her down and
ran followed by the others.


Tim approached the crying girl.
He saw her scrapped knee and wet spot
on her skirt.

“Are you ok kid?
I wish your knee wasn’t hurt and your clothes
were cleaned”

Without thinking Tim used his last wish
and it was granted.
The girl stopped crying and nodded
confused as the pain and wetness were
both gone.


She still didn’t notice her own changes
though as you walked away.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...

Later the boys come back only 1
Brought their big brother.
It was then the girl noticed that she was different
at least in size.

The big brother even at 17 years old
was 2 feet shorter than her but as he
worked up the courage to yell at her she
felt strange and noticed she was growing again.

She shot up to 10 feet tall.

The brother backed off and told the boys
to find a new girl to deal with.

Next

115333111.content:
Mark was an average teen boy with a not so average classmate who lives a few blocks away.

On a holiday weekend his parents had to go out of town for a sales conference for work.
He was left to do chores and take care of the family's cat.

It was a 4 day weekend from school.
That Friday morning he had just got the cats food and water and was about to tend to the garden.
As he took the strange new plant food that his parents bought called "Monster Grow" out of the shopping bag he didn't notice the bag had a hole. A bit of it fell into the cats food dish.



The cat "Ginger" approached the food dish. She sniffed it then hissed and walked away.
Mark was about to question it.
Just then Tina popped in to visit.

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/86...


Tina was Mark's unique classmate and crush for the last year.



"Hi Mark your parents called me to check up on you"


"Well I was just about to deal with the garden. If you don't mind waiting in here we can hang a bit afterwards"


"Okay" said Tina.

Mark then took the plant food outside.
Meanwhile Tina's stomach growled and her cat-like tendencies kicked in.

She smelled the new cat food Mark's parents had also tried.
She couldn't resist.


Without notice or care for the plant food mixed into the cat food Tina got on her knees.
She then chowed down on the food.
Little did she realize her uniqueness as a cat girl unlike a real cat actually attracted her to the "Monster Grow" she also didn't know about.


As she finished the cat food she suddenly felt very thirsty and drank the cats water too.
She then felt a strange feeling thru her body that quickly passed.


As she finished the water Mark came back in.

"Uh. Hey " he said awkwardly


"Oh my god Mark I'm so sorry I ate your cats food" she said apologizing and blushing.


"It's fine I guess for some strange reason Ginger stuck her nose up at it"


"I still feel bad Normally I can control my feline side better than that"


"Don't worry about it. Just get cleaned up and give Ginger more food and we're even"

Tina got to work and did so tho she had to refill the water dish a few times being overcome by a mysterious thirst.


"Ok with that done we gotta return this plant food to the garden store, the bag was damaged.



On the way Tina felt strange a couple times and oddly they had to stop for a drink.
Mark didn't question it.
It was a good thing their school gave them a transit pass.


They eventually got to the garden store and went to the service desk.
"Ah Mark glad you came in I was just about to phone your parents" said the clerk who knew the family.


"Would it have anything to do with the damage bag of plant food" asked Mark.


"I didn't know the bag was damaged but actually there was an emergency recall. Pretty serious.
Some crazy talk about being too strong and crazy stuff happening to plants watered after using the product. It's a good thing only your parents bought it so far. I've explicit instructions and precautions from the seller including to issue a no cost substitution and a refund of 3x the purchase price"



With that the clerk gave Mark the usual brand his parents bought undamaged and the money.
After checking with his parents he was happy they let him have the money.
He decided to treat Tina to lunch which surprise surprise turned out to be the seafood buffet nearby.
Oddly tho Tina seemed less hungry than usual.



Tina was however milking the FREE Unlimited drink refills.
She had at least 11 glasses of water, 4 glasses of milk , 3 root beers, 2 cups of orange soda and a cup of iced tea.


On the way home Tina felt strange again but it soon passed.
Even tho it's only Friday afternoon Mark decided they should go their separate ways since he still had gardening and chores to do.


As she walked home Tina felt strange yet again.
This time she noticed her shoes felt a bit tight but not the rest of her clothes.



Later...
115333111.title: Tina soon to be BIG Kitty

115333112.content:
Your name is Tom
And this is your best friend , Tomboy and secret crush
Tsuko

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/86...

Or at least this was Tsuko after the incident a few days ago....



It was a peaceful 4 day weekend from school for you both.

Tom had been left to do yard work while his parents had went to visit some relatives.
Tom was tending to the garden when Tsuko had come over.


The tomboy wanted to hangout but alas that wasn't an option just yet.
She noticed Tom had a strange bag of plant food.

"Huh Monster Grow? Wow they will name a product anything and make any wild claim to swindle customers huh?
Well Tom if I help you with this can we shoot hoops sooner"
She asked hopeful.


"I don't see why not"

Tom was about to instruct Tsuko but realized it was too late.
She had already started spreading the fertilizer by hand unconcerned with getting dirty or breaking a nail.


"Hey you're not supposed to use your bare hands with that stuff"


"Eh what's the harm it just dirt. Watch and learn" she said confidently then she took a bit and actually put it in her mouth and swallowed.

"See harmless! Shockingly it doesn't even have a taste or smell"

"I still think you should be careful and use gloves as the directions say" scolded Tom as they both finished the work.


Afterwards you both worked up an apitite or rather Tom did.
Tsuko oddly only had a thirst.

5 glasses of water and a Soda later after Tom ate Tsuko decided to let Tom do his chores but said they should go to nearby pond tomorrow for a Saturday of hanging out.


Neither of them noticed the seeds they planted suddenly began to sprout about 20 minutes after watering.
Tsuko on the other hand felt strange after leaving Tom's
The feeling passed.


She failed to notice the rest of the day that she was thirstier than usual and kept getting a drink ever 1 to 2 hours.
In fact it was her older and younger sisters who pointed out she was a pig for finishing a gallon of milk, a 2 liter of Coke and a bottle of OJ in addition to several dozen glasses of water.


Every now and then she'd feel strange but the feeling would pass.
That evening tho she noticed her clothes getting uncomfortably tight.
She also took a longer than normal shower and drank some of the shower water in the process.



That night she had trouble sleeping and got up 4 times for a drink.
The next morning Tsuko woke up to a surprise.


In her sleep she'd somehow grown to 8 1/2 feet tall.
Once shorter than Tom and her big sister she was now the biggest.


The only downside thus far was that she'd outgrown her clothes.
Quietly she managed to sneak into the attic and find some clothes from their deceased mother.


The biggest she could find barely fit but would do for now.
Now she had to decide what to do next

Hana was a typical little girl

Unfortunately her parents were rather busy.
One day Hana was left with the daughter of a colleague for babysitting and that’s where

Hana brought into the lab of said colleague.
Her sitter, Emma sat her on a work Station.
Emma was unaware that the good doctor had been tinkering with an enlarging ray.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/68...

It only had an enlargement function and was a prototype.
It was meant to enlarge food items but so far hadn’t worked.


As Emma assisted the professor, Hana sat sucking her thumb

Hana crawled over to the device and poked it with curiosity.
Unfortunately she accidentally activated it.
Intrigued by the light laser it emitted she stuck a hand under it.

Hana giggled as it tickled.
She then stuck her other hand under it the energy still surrounding her.
Next she crawled in front of it.
She giggled and clapped her hands getting tickled and thinking it was a game.
A few minutes later tho and the device powered down.


Losing interest Hana crawled back to where she was.
Later Emma takes Hana home for a nap.
