1231.content:
Note: taken from another story interactive who's owner griped about the content posted.


Allison, a little bit taller than most girls her age, with short boyishly cut blonde hair and brown eyes. She’s the very definition of tomboy and does her best to try and emulate her big brother whom she adores to the point of questionability. Her tale starts the day after a school field trip to the local science center gone wrong, where a small gas leak had struck the visiting students of her entire class. So far, there haven’t been any side effects but the dawn has only begun to break and breakfast is the most important meal of the day…


--------


“Allison! You’ve got to stop!”

“I’m sorry bro! Bu-But I’m—”

GROWL!

“I’m just so HUNGRY!”

RING!

The sound of the house phone ringing awoke you from your rather foreboding dream. What kind of dream it was, you couldn’t immediately recall given that the loud ringing of the phone startled you enough to send you falling to the floor. Uttering a few choice words under your breath, you get to your feet and shuffle out of your bedroom and into the hallway. You pick up the phone with a gruff, “Hello?”

“Good morning is this the Fisher residence?”

“Yeah it is and if this is a telemarketer so help me—”

“Oh, forgive me, this is Mrs. Kirsten, I’m Allison’s homeroom teacher at the Academy for Aspiring Young Ladies. I’m calling about the… incident… at the Science Center.”

“The incident…” You say, feeling that familiar rush of brotherly rage coursing through your veins. Sleep addled though you may be, you distinctly recall the reason why your little sister got to out a day early for spring break. “The gas leak you mean? The one that idiot tour guide assured was perfectly harmless and there wouldn’t be anything to worry about?”

“Ah, yes…” said Mrs. Kirsten at least had the good graces to sound embarrassed. “I apologize for the delay but the people at the Science Center were adamant in wanting to know if the parents of the visiting children have reported any… strange symptoms.”

“Strange as in…?” you ask, glancing over your shoulder and looking down the long hallway to your sister’s room. Did she leave her door open?

“Oh, well, a few parents called about their children having an inexplicably large appetite, some seeming quite starved despite eating well over three times their normal portions at dinner, and so on. Of course most of them weren’t really able to hold in that much food for long but it was quite troubling for their parents…”

“I see…” You mutter, “And has anything been done for those kids then?”

“Oh yes, the Science Center has asked that any children reporting such symptoms be brought in for a quick checkup.”

“Huh, well that’s good at least…” You grumbled, still quite sore that anything had happened at all at a supposedly “safe” school field trip before spring vacation.
“So I gather that Allison is alright? No strange symptoms of any kind?”

You shake your head, trying to clear the last of the cobwebs free, but that damned feeling of dread refuses to budge from the pit of your stomach… But like heck you’d trust your little sister with those crazies at the Science Center. “No, everything’s fine.”

“Oh, thank goodness,” Mrs. Kirsten said with a relieved sigh, “But do feel free to call the school number if you should notice anything. I’m afraid that though the children have the week off for springtime vacation we’re busy as bees over here.”

It hits you then, like a punch in the gut, the dream… But was it just that, a dream?

“Yeah, I’ll do that. Thank you.” You quickly hang up the phone and race for the stairs and take them two at a time, leaping over the final four and sliding into the kitchen where you see—



Allison looked up and smiled delightfully, “Hey big bro!”

You smile and shake your head ruefully at your sister. Once again, she dressed in clothes that she had “mistakenly” thought to be her own. Mistaken insomuch that her attire consisted of a t-shirt several sizes too big for her and sporting his high schools’ name across the chest and a pair of shorts that went well below her knees. Though your mother might believe otherwise, there was no way that Allison wasn’t a tomboy with her insistent need to pilfer his clothes and claim them as her own rather than where anything that she deemed as being “girly”.

“Good morning, Alley. Making yourself breakfast I see.”

Indeed she was though it was the simplest breakfast known to mankind. A bowl and the gallon of milk, freshly bought and still shut tight, sat on the small dining room table adjacent to the kitchen. Allison was standing in the kitchen proper, one bare feet sticking out for balance as she stood on her tiptoes upon the linoleum floor as she struggled to lean up and reach a box of her favorite cereal.

“Here you go, short stuff,” you chuckle, reaching over and grabbing the cereal for her as well as one of your own box. Frankly, you didn’t have the stomach for any of that artificial crap unlike your kid sister and other children her age.

Her cheeks puff out and she sticks her tongue out at you with a loud proclamation, “I’m not short! I’m the tallest girl in my class!”

“Tall for an eight year old maybe but—” Your eyes catch the clock and the time, “Oh Jesus, I’m gonna be late for work!”

You rush out of the kitchen and start to get ready even as Allison shouts after you, “But I thought you had taken the week off to spend with me while mom and dad are gone?!”

“I did, Allie!” You shout back, tossing clothes aside to find your uniform. “But I didn’t expect you to get out a day early!”

“Does that mean I have to go with you to work?!”

You wince at that idea. Not that you didn’t trust your kid sister at your workplace but… well, there was a reason why there was a phrase involving kids and candy stores… Not that you thought your sister would steal but you didn’t trust your co-workers not to give her more than a fair share of “samples” again. Once was bad enough.

“Sorry kiddo but no! Look’s like you’re just going to have the house all to yourself for the day!”

“Is that alright?” You hear her shout around a mouthful of cereal. “Mom and dad won’t get mad?”

Not if they don’t find out… You think to yourself as you race back to the dining room. Allison is sitting at the table, eating through a bowl of cereal like no tomorrow. That trepid feeling returns but you ignore it and ruffle her blonde hair. “I’ll only be at work until early this afternoon at the latest, alright? Lock the door behind me and don’t open it for anyone, alright? If something happens you call me and I’ll be back with bells on.”

“Can I eat in front of the TV?”

You chuckle. That’s your sister, always with the right priorities. “Sure, just try not to eat us out of house and home okay, short stuff?”

You kiss Allison on the forehead and she shoves at you with a disgusted but blushing face as you race to the front door. You pause for a moment and glance back down the hall. For a moment you could have sworn that the milk gallon was over two-thirds empty… Your eye catches the clock and all thoughts of half-empty milk jugs are summarily tossed aside as you race for your car and head off towards work.


Your name by the way if you wish to switch POV's is Robbert often called Robb for short.

12311.content:
Only an hour into work at the office and you're doing alright. But you think back to the conversation on the phone, the dream, and your little sister. The thought of what occurred at the Science Center and what sort of effect it could have on her. But she seemed fine before you left. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary. But the dream that you had was still coming back. It was still hazy, but you remember something happened involving your sister that felt almost realistic... Almost too realistic...

But soon your thoughts are put on hold as your cellphone rings. You look into it and see it's your sister Allison calling. You try to brush off the dream and everything else as you answer her call.

"Hey Allie, what's up?"

"Mmmm, this is good... Oh hey big bro! Umm, there's something I need to talk to you about."

"Okay, what's wrong?"

"Well, sometime after you left, I was having my breakfast, but I wasn't full. So I had two slices of toast, then two more, then the rest of the bread."

The details she began to unfold already made you feel uncomfortable, but you let her go on.

"So after all of that, I still wasn't full. So I grabbed the carton of orange juice and drank all of that, but it still wasn't enough. I even drank the rest of the milk, which was only about half a gallon, but it wasn't enough either."

"Uh Allie...?"

"Then I ate a couple apples and bananas that were in the fridge. I'm eating the last apple right now, actually..."

"Is that all?"

"Well yeah *munch* I'm almost full. I should be full after this apple. But man, my stomach has been acting strange all day."

"And you ate all of that within an hour since I left?"

"*munch* Yeah, it's weird. I've been really hungry since you left. And-- Whoa. My belly's looking pretty big..."

"What?!"

You compose yourself after you yelled in the office, as a few of your coworkers were looking a you. You make your way into the break room, which was empty at the moment.

"Allie, you can't be serious. There's no way you ate all of that!"

"Well, I did, big bro. Give me a sec and I'll send you a pic."

She hung up on the conversation and within a minute, you received a text message on your phone. You open it and nearly flipped out after looking at the image. Allison's belly was large and globular, almost as if she swallowed a small beach ball. It nearly hung off her waistline but was still holding on to the large shirt she wore, as it went past her navel by a couple inches. You backed out of the image and immediately called her back.

"Allie, this is outrageous! You look like a blimp!"

"I'm sorry big bro, I was just really hungry! I couldn't control myself! But it seems like it's ove-- UUURRGGHHHH!"

"Allie? Alley, what's wrong?"

"My stomach! The pressure is too tight! I feel like I'm gonna..."

Before you could say anything or she could finish her sentence, an almost deafening sound emitted from the receiving end...

*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPP!!!!!*

You nearly lost the hearing in your right ear after the sound happened. You grabbed a napkin from the counter and cleaned it just in case.

"Allie, are you okay?"

"I think so... *Urp!* Oh man... That was a loud one..."

"No kidding... I almost went deaf in one ear..."

"Uh oh..."

"Uh oh? What uh oh?"

"Big bro... I need you to come home now... Something happened..."

"What do you mean? What happened?"

"I think... I grew..."

"...What?"

"Big bro, please, just come home!"

"Alright, alright, I'll be there!"

"HURRY!"

You hang up the phone and made your way to the parking lot. You pulled out your keys, started your car, and drove home as fast as you could.


You make it home to see an empty fridge and empty cupboards.
You search for Allison.
You soon find her in your room downing your hidden stash of snacks.



Immediately you notice she wasn't Kidding earlier on the phone. Your "little" sisters stomach was no longer fat and bulging but instead as trim as normal however there she was sitting on a pile of shredded clothing the remains of her shirt barely hanging onto her and her panties were like a thong.

Allison was now 9 feet tall. She noticed a sound and turned her head.

"Big bro you're home" she said gleefully.

Next...

( not Allison's stomach/tummy WILL always Revert back to being skinny/trim eventually )

A few minutes after you leaving the house to work with Allison having all the house too herself, wich she use most of the time by watching Cartoons on the TV while finishing her cereal with milk, but even though she finish up her cereal she still fill empty in her belly, like it wasn't enough to fill her up.

Allison: oh man i could sure eat another bowl cereal and more milk on it.

And so she did as she went to the kitchen and put more cereal and milk on it, with the gallon now empty she throws it away in the garbage as her parents thought her and grabs another gallon of milk and pour it on the bowl and finally grabs a gallon of orange Juice and pour it on a cup, However as she finish it to pour it her belly all the sudden lets out a growl making her rub her tummy to calm it down.

Allison: Oh man my Tummy is having munchies in there, i better grab more to eat

as Allison picks her cereals with milk plus grabs a still feels hungry despite she ate a bowl of cereal with milk in it last time yet it didn't seem to be enough with , soo she grab a bag of cookies in the counter and with the cereal milk and the a glass of orange juice she went to the couch and resume watching the tv, however she doesn't notice that her shirt is getting much fill as her belly grows rounder each inch.

in less than 10 minutes Allison finish up all the cereal and her bag of cookies with a glass of orange


“Oof… that was a big breakfast…” Allison leaned back on the chair, one hand rubbing her tummy and the other pushing aside the thoroughly licked clean bowl, knocking over the two empty boxes of cereal she had just guzzled her way through. The young eight-year-old had no idea what had come over her that morning. She woke up fine and dandy and wasn’t all that hungry until she had taken her first spoonful.

Her stomach then proceeded to let her know just how starved she really was and she was honestly surprised that her brother hadn’t heard it in his room upstairs. He hadn’t even noticed that she had finished off her box of cereal and was just starting on his own when he left for work. In the span of fifteen minutes, Allison had eaten two entire boxes of cereal, devoured a whole box of cookies, chugged down a whole gallon of milk, and drank several cups of orange juice.

And yet…

“I don’t feel full…” Allison worriedly looked down at her tummy, rubbing it as it grumbled. The young girl wondered if she was sick and, upon another rumbling growl, winced. She decided that yes she was ill and that she would have to follow her mother’s advice of feeding a cold and stuffing a fever.

Getting up from the table, Allison swooned slightly on her feet as her stomach sloshed with her extra large breakfast churning inside. She moaned at the strange sensation and placed both of her hands on her taut belly. Her stomach looked like she had swallowed a small melon and it certainly felt as heavy as one in her hands.

“Ohh… how come I don't feel full when my belly is so stuffed with food?” Allison groaned, closing her eyes as her hands moved lightly over her taut skin. A slight rumbling began in her belly, causing her body to start to tremble. She moaned again as her belly receded in her grasp, shrinking until it was only a slight swell instead of a large curve.

Yet the pressure, the tightness, hadn’t abated. If anything, it had grown to new levels and Allison felt it rising even higher until was eventually released in a long gassy belch. “UUUUUUURRRRRRRP!”

Her clothes tightened as her body swelled upwards, her borrowed t-shirt climbing up her stomach and her shorts rising above her knees. As she crept past five feet, the string along the waistband of her shorts untied itself, her stomach bulging slightly as the hem of her shirt rose enough to reveal her belly button. Her growth came to a halt as she crested six feet in all, her brothers’ clothes now fitting her like a second skin as she now stood several inches taller.

Her sleeves caved in to her grown arms and the seams along her thighs tore open, her flesh bulging through as the curve of her butt peaked over the waistband. Her underwear, the only article of clothing she was wearing that was her own, surrendered to her swollen hips with a loud snap that caused Allison to gasp softly.

Allison fell back onto her chair, the wood groaning loudly in protest, as she panted in the afterglow of her growth spurt and the gassy belch that she had unleashed throughout it. Her eyes opened in a lazy stare down towards her feet, watching her toes wriggle on the much smaller kitchen tile. She looked slowly about the room, taking in the change of perspective even when sitting down.

“Did I… really grow bigger?” Allison quietly murmured, the idea alone being more than enough to generate a strange but not unfamiliar sensation in her privates that she’s too young to really understand. It’s the same sensation she feels when she daydreams of her big brother and her doing things she’s seen and heard other couples do. Her eyes glazed over slightly as another, more familiar sensation began to make itself known to her.

Grumble…

“I’m hungry again…”

123121.content:
You were wrapping at work and were on your way to your supervisor’s office to let her know you were leaving. As you walked past the breakroom, you noticed a small crowd gathered around the TV. Curious, you stepped into the breakroom.

“Hey, what’s going on?”

Your coworker Sarah didn’t take her eyes off the TV. “Something’s going on over in Olympian Heights.” She glanced at you. “Isn’t that the subdivision you live in?”

“Yeah. What’s going on?”

Sarah hesitated. “Uh, all they’ve said so far is that a, and I quote, ‘large child’ is attacking the neighborhood.”

“A ‘large child’ is attacking? What does that mean? A fat kid found his dad’s gun?” You were growing nervous. “My sister is at home. I should probably call her.”

Brian looked up from his phone. “Uh, there are some rumors on Twitter that it’s a kid, uh…” he hesitated, then gave a disbelieving chuckle. “A kid the size of a house.”

You paused, halfway through dialing. “What?”

“That’s what popping up on Twitter. There’s no footage, though.” Brian said, as you finished dialing.

“So it’s some stupid prank,” Sarah said, rolling her eyes.

"No one's answering," you said, lowering your phone. “I should probably get over there.”

“I’m not sure about that,” Rob said, pointing to the TV. “Listen.”

You turned to pay attention to the news report and the woman sitting in the local newsroom. “-ordered an evacuation of the surrounding area and police are in the process of closing roads to inbound traffic. Our ‘Five in the Sky’ chopper is now over the neighborhood.” The woman looked uncomfortable. “Some of the images coming out of the subdivision are disturbing and may be inappropriate for some viewers. Craig, what do you see?”

The screen switched to an aerial view. You recognized your neighborhood, but it looked like a tornado had blown through. Several houses were missing roofs. Your next door neighbors’ house was missing several walls as well, actually looking like there had been some sort of explosion inside the front rooms of the house. The camera zoomed in on the damage, and you could see that your house was mostly fine, except the front door was laying in the front yard, surrounded by what looked like pieces of the patio doorframe.

“Allie, where are you…?” you muttered.

“Shauna, it almost looks like a hurricane has struck the houses down here in Olympian Heights,” Craig was saying. “One house you can see has almost been completely destroyed.” A graphic highlighted the house next door. “Reports suggest that is the house that the, uh, giant emerged from.”

The breakroom broke out in excited chatter. “It is a giant?” Sarah said.

Craig continued. “-houses have had their roofs torn off. The giant is currently a few houses down and appears to be systematically tearing the roofs off and removing items from each house.”

The chopper cam panned around, and then there he was. The breakroom, you included, gasped.

The giant was sitting on his knees with his bare back to the chopper, shoveling stuff out of the house. The news switched to a split screen between the aerial footage and the newsroom.

“Craig, can you estimate the g-giant’s size,” Shauna asked, voice trembling slightly.

“Hard to say, Shauna. You can see he’s taller than, um, all the one-story homes surrounding him, and he’s still kneeling down. Probably more than 50 feet tall.

Shauna’s eyes widened. She silently mounted “Fifty Feet.” Out loud she said, “Craig, some eyewitnesses have reported the giant is a child. Can you confirm this?”

“The scale is throwing any point of reference off, but hold on, Shauna, we’ll try to come around to his fro…hang on, he’s doing something.” Craig tried to keep his voice steady. “He’s getting up!”

The giant slowly got to his feet. The helicopter was keeping a respectful distance, away from and above the giant’s head. The giant turned around.

“It’s a girl!” Craig exclaimed.

You gasped. Your phone slid out of your slack grip and shattered on the tile. The giant was a girl, alright. She was several stories tall, and didn’t have on a stitch of clothing, so it was pretty obvious. You couldn’t blame the anchors for using male pronouns. Between the flat chest and the short haircut and just the sheer impossibility of the situation, it had been easy to assume the town was under attack by a giant boy.

But it was Allison. Your "little" sister, whom you had last seen struggling to reach the top shelf of the pantry, was now more than twice the size of your house.

By now, Allison was strolling across the street to the McKays’ house. You noticed that her stomach was huge and round and totally out of proportion to her frame. She had even gone from an innie to an outie. Evidently, though, she was still hungry. She dropped to her knees in front of the house and casually ripped the roof off. She reached in where you knew the kitchen was and proceeded to shovel the contents of the room, presumably food, into her mouth.

“She’s…eating the contents of the house,” Craig said, dumbstruck.

“Craig, can you gauge her age?” Shauna asked.

Craig hesitated. “Well, her size makes it difficult to, uh, pinpoint, since the scale’s so…skewed. But she’s, uh, obviously… a young girl.” Craig was obviously uncomfortable being asked to describe a naked elementary schooler on TV. “Uh, my pilot doesn’t think she’s any older than 10. Maybe 8 or 9.”

For her part, Allison kept shoveling the kitchen’s contents into her mouth. She wasn’t being picky; you saw some furniture get swept up and tossed into her mouth. What if she wasn’t paying attention? What if a person got swept up between her huge fingers?

Sarah had evidently been thinking along similar lines. “She’s just…eating. Oh, god, what if she eats a person?”

Fortunately, it never got to that point. Allie apparently exhausted the kitchen and sat back on her calves. Then, she grabbed some shrubs from the front of the house and started devouring the McKays’ landscaping.

Finally, Allie appeared to be sated. She got back to her feet, and seemed to notice the helicopter for the first time, gazing directly at the camera and waving while wearing a wide smile. She walked to under where it was hovering in a few steps, and reached up toward it.

Craig said something to the pilot. The view of Allison shifted a bit as the helicopter bobbed around. “Don't worry, we can stay out of her reach.”

Just then Allie’s eyes went wide and she dropped her arms from the chopper to cradle her bulging gut. As you watched, her stomach shrank under her hands, deflating back into Allie’s normal lean midriff. Then, her face screwed up into a look of discomfort, she opened her mouth, and “BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!”

Allison released a thunderous belch. You definitely heard it through the TV speakers, and you were pretty sure you could hear it in the distance. Shauna flinched and ripped her earpiece out.

With a rapturous look on her young face, Allie once again reached toward the chopper. Again, the view bobbed and weaved as the chopper stayed beyond her reach.

Except, a moment later, the helicopter appeared to be descending toward Allison’s grasping fingers. Quickly.

“What are they doing?” Brian asked.

“Craig…?” Shauna began.

“She’s growing! Holy shit!” Craig cried as Allison swelled to take up more and more of the camera frame. “Pull up! Pull up!”

The view became chaotic for a moment as the helicopter jerked and swerved. It dipped to one side but then jerked back up, twisting around before refocusing on Allison, now from a considerable distance.

“W-w-we’re all right,” Craig stammered. “She just…just grew. Right up to the chopper! She actually got some fingers on the landing skid, but we broke away.” He was panting. “Shauna, it’s…it’s incredible. This 8 year old girl can just pluck helicopters out of the sky!”

The 8 year old girl in question was staring at the chopper with a pout, evidently disappointed that her new toy had escaped. Then she took a look at the neighborhood around and below her and her smile returned.

By now the houses only came up to Allie's knees. Still grinning like a maniac, she placed a bare foot on a car parked in a driveway. A moment later, the sedan crumpled like a soda can. Allison giggled, then bent down to pick up the wreck. She brought the flattened car up to face and studied it for a moment. Then her eyelids drooped and she bit her bottom lip as a shudder ran through her body. Her free hand made a few tentative motions between her legs.

“Oh, shit,” Sarah said. “She’s enjoying this. Like really enjoying this.”

You looked at her, shocked. “She’s eight.”

“Same age I was when I discovered that my electric toothbrush didn’t just brush teeth. Some girls are precocious.” Sarah laughed nervously. “And what’s more precocious than a 65 foot growth spurt?”

Meanwhile, Allison had come back to her senses. She refocused on the crushed car in her hand, then, after an exaggerated pitcher’s windup, threw it as hard as she could. The mass of crumpled metal flew a few blocks before impacting in a clump of trees in a cloud of dust and smoke.

Allison stood there with her hands on her hips, looking at the cloud of dust. You knew her well enough to know she was dissatisfied with her effort. Then she turned her attention back to the tiny cars and houses and helicopters around her, as if considering what to do next…

123121231.content:
“I-I-gotta get home!” you stammered, fleeing the breakroom before any of your coworkers could say anything. Pulling Sarah along You ran to your car, and seconds later were peeling out of the parking lot.


"Robbert what the hell are we doing" asked your friend slash coworker.



As you drove, you considered still calling the Science Center. You fumbled around in your jacket for a moment before remembering that you had broken your phone on the breakroom tile. “Shit!”

"You forget you trashed your phone" said Sarah feeling ignored which was true enough.


You turned onto the main road through town leading to your subdivision. You completely ignored the speed limit, figuring that all the cops were more worried about Girlzilla than traffic violations. You sped through a left turn on red and there Allison was, her naked 7-story body visible for blocks and towering over everything in the immediate area. It was so surreal.


"Holy crap Allison" said a stunned Sarah


As you sped closer, Allison bent down. When she straightened back up, she was grasping a tree. As you watched, she put the upper boughs in her mouth and stripped all the leaves off. After chewing and swallowing the leaves and upper branches, she started biting off and devouring large pieces of the trunk. To you, each piece she bit off was half the size of a telephone pole, but to Allie they were bite size. In less than a minute, the tree had disappeared into Allison’s stomach, which by now was bulging considerably once again.


"Wow that's some appetite" Sarah continued her commentary trying to diffuse some of the tension.


The lanes leading away from Olympian Heights were gridlocked with cars, and the sidewalks and medians were crowded with both the fleeing and the gawking, but your path was mostly clear. You made the last turn toward your house and were greeted by a police roadblock.


You halted in front of the roadblock and a police officer came up to your driver-side window. “Sir, you need to turn around,” she said. “This area is being evacuated.”


“I need to get through! My, uh…” You hesitated. You weren’t sure if you wanted to broadcast that it was your sister currently eating the town. “My little sister is in there! I need to get to her!”


"He's telling the truth officer" added Sarah with urgency.


The cop looked sympathetic, but she held firm. “We have officers going through the intact homes, and clearing the surrounding area as they can. Don’t worry, they’ll find your sister, if they haven’t already, but you need to go. Evacuees are heading to the high school.” She hesitated, then added gently, “If you give me her description and name, I can look into finding your sister.”



You sighed. It looked like you didn’t have a choice. “Her name is Allison. She’s eight. She has blonde hair, cut short, and brown eyes.”



The cop was writing this down in a notepad. “OK, you know her height?”



You grimaced as you inhaled sharply. “Well, this morning she was 4’6”, but now she’s, uh, probably around 70 feet.


The cop gave you a puzzled look for a second, then her eyes went wide. “What.”



Before she could say anything else, a tremor shook the road. The cop looked up and past your car and her eyes somehow went even wider.


“Get out of the car!” She yelled, ripping open your door. She grabbed your arm. The tremors were getting stronger. “Get outta here! Move!”

Sarah luckily put 2 and 2 together and got out of the passengers seat as fast as if the car were on fire.


You allowed yourself to be pulled from the car, and before you could say or do anything else, the cop had grabbed your arm and was pulling you down the street. Sarah followed.



You took shelter in an alley with some other officers, and finally got a chance to turn and see what you were fleeing from, though you had a pretty good idea.


"Holy fuck she grew again" said Sarah awestruck. "If your family expects me to babysit her I demand triple rate plus hazard pay" she added.



Sure enough, when you turned you saw Allison, walking toward the street you had just vacated with thunderous footfalls, and casually munching on another tree. Your stomach dropped. She had grown again! Allison had to be more than 100 feet tall by this point! You started to move forward, to say something to her, but the cop stopped you.


Little did you know you were pretty close. Allison was now 105 feet tall but otherwise exactly the same as her last spurts. In truth you , Sarah and Shauna were both secretly shocked yet glad certain parts of her hadn't yet developed further than the prior spurts.



“Let me go!” you pulled at the cop’s grip. “I told you, that’s my sister!” You pulled your shoulder from the cop’s grip. “Maybe me.. Me and my.. Uh... Friend here get her under some measure of control.”


"Wait just because I'm a family friend and Allison's favorite babysitter doesn't mean I'm willing to do this. You didn't even ask. I mean sure I had an idea this was your plan but I never actually said yes or no" said Sarah.



The cop raised an eyebrow, but all she said was, “That may be, but you’ll have to plan your approach. Carefully. She doesn’t exactly pay a lot of attention to what’s underfoot.” She pointed. “Look.”



You looked and watched Allison step over a strip mall into its parking lot right off the street. She didn’t quite lift her right foot high enough and her toes clipped the rear wall and roof of the building. Allison didn’t even notice as her minor act of unconscious clumsiness caused part of the rear wall and roof to collapse, and she proceeded into the parking lot, cars disappearing under her bare feet as she did.




You realized the cop wasn’t quite right; Allison wasn’t being careful about what she stepped on, true, but she was also trying to step on things. This was fun to her and as Sarah had eluded earlier a potential **cringe** turn on of sorts.
You watched as she marched right down a line of parked cars, giggling as they all crumpled underfoot.



Allison was massive! From this perspective, next to and under her, you got an appreciation for her size that you missed across the television. Allison’s billboard-sized face towered more than 10 stories above you, and her short blond hair was tossed by a breeze that didn’t exist at your elevation.



Allison stopped momentarily, picking out a lamppost that had gotten stuck between her toes, then continued into the street. You suddenly realized what was directly in Allison’s path. “Oh, nonononono. Please, don’t do-“ CRUNCH! Your little lime green coupe, your pride and joy, caught Allison’s heel in the middle of the passenger compartment. It didn’t stand a chance.


"Dang I know I said your car was tacky Robb but that kinda sucks for you. Weren't you still paying that thing off"


"Sarah please don't remind me" you grimace mourning the loss of your car.



For whatever reason, stepping on your car gave Allison pause. She shifted her bare foot off the flattened car and looked down. “Ooooh, what a pretty color,” she said. You wondered if she recognized your car.




But no. You paled as Allison licked her lips and reached down and picked up your ruined car. She straightened back up and held it in front of her face for a moment, your car barely fitting in her hand width and length wise. Of course as she lifted the now crumpled car up to her face she crunched it in a bit on the sides.



“I’ve never eaten a car,” Allison mused. As if responding to her hesitation, her stomach, once again bizarrely trim and skinny, released a growl that rattled windows. “This one does looks pretty tasty, and I’m sooooo hungry.” Allison started ripping off chunks of the car with her teeth and began devouring it, barely seeming to chew. It didn’t take long for the car to be finished off, and Allison was licking her fingers as gasoline, oil, and fluids dribbled from the corners of her mouth.


"Eh not bad but note to self definitely NOT the best snack" mused Allison.


This was getting insane. You had to do what you came here to do. Taking the cops by surprise, you bolted out of the alley, dragging Sarah along then waving your arms. “Allison! Allie! It’s me! It’s your brother! Sarah is with me too!"


"Dam it Robb what the hell" said Sarah both annoyed and concerned.

123122.content:
A small part of Allison was worried, scared even, of what was happening to her. People don’t just get insanely hungry and devour enough food for their tummies to look like little bowling balls, nor do they grow a whole several inches taller after unleashing a massive belch. If they did, she’d have surely done more belching contests with her big brother because for what little part of Allison was afraid, a far larger part was cheering and leaping up and down with glee.

Allison was the tallest girl in her class, a fact that many a school bully tried to belittle her for to no avail. In point of fact, she had become something of a bully herself though she was never intentionally malicious about it. She just really liked looking down on her peers and rubbing it in their faces by reaching up for things they couldn’t even hope to touch. She adored stepping on and breaking things, a warm rush coursing through her on those few times she managed to get her foot down atop a toy vehicle or mock building.

Most of all though she loved, absolutely loved, playing with little dolls, especially the really small ones that fit in the palm of her hand. Many were the play dates she had with those little dolls, with most of them pretend versions of her friends, her would-be bullies, even the teachers and other adults, but for the one she played with the most, the one that was the smallest she had and was based on the one person she loved the most, her big brother.

Playing pretend with the dolls always left her with a tingly feeling in her privates but never as much as when she pretended it was her brother that she was clutching with one hand. Her cheeks would always flush red and the tingling would get so strong down there that Allison’s other hand had been drawing ever closer and closer to it.
A fierce grumble from her tummy interrupted her daydreaming and Allison swallowed on reflex, her eyes widening in surprise as she felt a small lump travel down her throat to land in her empty stomach. She glanced down at her hands in surprise, wondering just what they had grabbed for her to snack on before her stomach loosed another insistent gurgle.

“If I keep eating, I’ll get bigger and bigger…” She said to herself, looking worriedly around the kitchen before she shivered and grinned delightfully. “I’ll just go outside before my next growth spurt, then I won’t wreck the house!”

Left unsaid was the fact that other houses, particularly those of their neighbors whom Allison rather disliked for their general meanness, were fair game. Especially so considering that virtually no one in the neighborhood was home for spring break.

Allison got up from the chair, which groaned in relief causing her to giggle. She didn’t really feel heavier than she had before but she had certainly gained some weight and was going to gain a whole lot more. She walked passed the table completely ignorant of the fact that both her cereal bowl and several utensils were gone and that her tummy, though still quite small compared to earlier, was starting to bulge just a tiny bit outwards.

The six foot tall eight-year-old stood before the refrigerator with an eager smile and, with a lick of her lips, opened the door as wide as she could. She had to lean down and forward a bit, but that didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that this was because she was so much bigger than she had been mere minutes ago. Her smile grew even wider at that thought.

Not even stopping to consider her vast array of choices present before her, Allison knelt down in front of the fridge and started eating everything that lay within. At first, she was careful with how she ate, taking the time to open a packet of cheese and eating it one slice at a time. Her tummy’s impatient rumbling and her earlier daydream together enticed her to speed up and soon the kitchen floor was a small sty of debris with nary a crumb of food left in the fridge or the cabinets.

Small in that while a few thoroughly licked clean cups of yogurt and pudding littered the ground, there were few packets or empty boxes. Only tiny bits and pieces of plastic and cardboard, all bearing bite marks, littered the floor in front of Allison.

She alternated between them, the fridge and the cabinets, accidentally pulling one loose on its hinges with her eagerness to eat what treats lay within. It didn’t even occur to Allison that much of what lay in the cabinets was unprepared foodstuffs like powdered mash potatoes, tomato paste, or uncooked noodles, she ate them and most of their packaging all the same, sometimes all at once to get a semblance of a full meal.

Despite her hunger and her eagerness to grow, Allison did take some time to play with her food. Antics that brought a guffaw from her brother and a disapproving look from their parents on more than one occasion. She opened a jar of pickles with ease, bowing to an imaginary audience before scarfing them down. She stuffed her mouth full with grapes, her cheeks bulging, before she swallowed them down stems and all. Eventually though, Allison had emptied the contents of the kitchen down to a lone bottle of soda.

Allison sat back on the heels of her feet as she chugged down the bottle. Though she was enjoying the taste of the bubbly drink, something she normally wasn’t allowed to have that often, Allison was more focused on the feeling of it pouring into her stomach, feeling her tummy bulge outwards with every gulp.

After guzzling the last drop she tossed it aside and wiped her mouth clean with the back of her hand. She looked down at her belly, which sat like a large bowling ball over her torn and straining shorts. Despite emptying out the fridge and cabinets of their contents and leaving barely any scraps behind in her gluttony, Allison did not feel the tiniest bit full but the familiar pressure was there much more than before.

“Oh…” She cradled her swollen stomach in her hands and hiccupped. “Oh man…”

Her stomach rumbled, a faint trembling growing outwards that made her quiver where she knelt before it slowly started to recede in her hands and the pressure inside it rose to match it immensely, earning a startled groan of pain from Allison. Yet even with a glimmer of tears in her eyes, Allison was smiling broadly with delight because she knew that soon, she was going to unleash a massive burp and following that burp would come an equally large growth spurt.

“And mommy isn’t here to lecture me on not burping in the kitchen,” said Allison. Her eyes widened with sudden realization and she said a word that she heard her brother use once before as she rose up to her full six foot stature. “I’ve got to get outside!”
123122.title: Stick with Allison's growing munchies

1231221.content:
Allison hopped to her feet and ran as fast as she could out the kitchen and down the hall to the door. She got there in record time, her longer legs covering more distance. Unfortunately for the enlarged eight year old, her heightened perspective did not help her in spotting her shoes that she had kicked haphazardly onto the floor. Her enlarged foot landed on one, squashing it flat beneath her soles and she stumbled shoulder first into the door. Unable to handle the sudden impact of a six-foot tall eight-year-old girl, the door snapped clean off its hinges falling flat onto the ground and letting Allison spill out onto the front yard.

The blonde haired girl rolled onto her back and lay there stunned for a moment, wide eyes blinking up at the sky before she started to smile. A small giggle escaped her before she started laughing outright. “Oh that was so coouuuuuuuuuuUUURRRRRRRP!”

The belch was louder than her last one and sent nearby birds away onto the wind fast as their little wings could carry them. Allison blushed slightly in embarrassment but there was no hiding the near rapturous smile on her face as she began to grow.

Her borrowed shorts were the first to succumb to her increasing girth, her swelling thighs causing them to rip along the sides with the rest being buried beneath the swelling hills of her ballooning butt. Her brother’s t-shirt was next to go though it did not go without a fight. The sleeves easily ripped free from her shoulders but the rest was refusing to budge and Allison was soon finding it hard to breath with how tight the collar was around her neck, never mind how tightly the shirt squeezed around her chest. A deep gasp for air was all it took to have the shirt exploding off her in a tatter of cloth, leaving Allison completely nude.

All too soon, her growth spurt came to an end, leaving Allison several feet taller than she had been before breakfast. From the soles of her feet to the top of her blonde head, Allison was now all of ten feet and a few sparse inches tall.

The amazonian eight-year old lay there, basking in the afterglow of her growth spurt, smiling almost drunkenly as she closed her eyes with a soft sigh. One hand tentatively making motions towards her crotch while the other found itself busy brushing aside linger pieces of clothing. Her nudity didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that she was too big for regular clothes.

“Oh…” She cooed, her fingers just barely touching upon her special place when her stomach rumbled loud enough that her whole body trembled, startling her out of her euphoric reverie.

“Whoa, I’m starved…” She sat up and pushed herself up to her feet, looking about her yard and the surrounding houses. Allison had eaten everything remotely edible in her house, which meant that it would be up to the neighbors to quench her enlarging appetite.

Actually… Allison thought to herself with a devious smile as her eyes fell upon the house next door, Wendy Barnes’s house should have more than enough food for me…
Wendy was a blonde, thirteen-year-old neighbor of Allison’s that would sometimes babysit her whenever her brother was unable to. Contrary to most of her other neighbors, Allison actually liked Wendy, who was one of the few girls that didn’t lecture her on being a tomboy. However, it was Wendy’s older sister, Vanessa, that Allison truly disliked above all others for three very important reasons.

One, the girl was far taller than Allison and even her brother, though being as old as him that made sense but didn’t endear the older girl to her any. Second, even when her parents said it was okay, Vanessa never let Wendy or Allison play in the pool, many times barring them from the house altogether as she threw another wild, food-filled party. Three, and most important of all, according to Wendy, Vanessa had taken her brother’s v-card.

Allison had no idea what a v-card was but given how much she treasured her own trading cards, it had to be very important, especially when her brother forbade her from asking their parents about it, saying they would through a worse fit than when he bought her a shiny Charizard card.

Allison easily stepped over the fence separating her house from Billy’s and paused. She giggled and proceeded to step back over the fence and over it once more before her eyes fell upon the house in question. Like many other houses in Olympia Heights, it was an opulent work of art and while not the biggest it came pretty close but Allison’s gaze was upon the pool.

It never looked so inviting with a deep blue tiling and a faint hint of steam rising from the surface of the water. Allison laughed to herself as she walked around the pool and realized that she could sit down in the deep end and still easily rest her arms on the pool’s edge. She wondered how far her legs would stretch out across it and how much more she’d need to eat before she was big enough for her feet to rest on the other end of the pool.

Her stomach grumbled again and she grimaced, the water of the pool quivering to the trembling of her hunger.

“I’ll take a dip later,” she said to herself as she walked around the pool and towards the door. She started to lean down to pull the door straight off its hinges, as she was sure she could do, when another far more delightful idea came to mind. It was a movie that Wendy had shown her once and really, when else would she get the chance to reenact such a scene? Besides, it wasn’t like anyone was home to try and call the army or something on her, right?

Allison grinned as she stood up to her full height and raised her foot up perpendicular to the door.

“I. Am. HUNGRY!”

SMASH!

12322.content:
Moving around the basement, Joe felt something was off. He took inventory of his workspace and noticed that some of his growth pills were missing.

Upstairs in her room Megan examined the bottles. The pills were small and capsule like.

"oooo red candy. It looks tasty" said Megan.


She then opened the 1st bottle and took out 3 pieces of "candy"
She put them in her mouth and sucked on them then swallowed.

"Mmmm yummy cherry flavor" she said.

It had been Joe's intention to make the pills palatable to the test subject hence the flavor.


Megan happily and blissfully unaware of what she was ingesting took 4 more pills.


Moments later Megan heard footsteps and hid the stolen bottles.
Her brother Joe then popped in.


"I'm looking for some pills I've been working on. They were in my lab that the family is banned from and now 2 bottles are missing. You haven seen or swiped them have you" said Joe.


"Nope but if I find em I'll let you know" said Megan nervously.

Joe eyed her suspiciously then left. Megan pulled out the 1st bottle then quickly took a handful of pills this time and woofed them down. Just then Joe returned.


"Aha I caught you red handed this time you little thief! I'd tell mom on you but I'm more worried about you taking those pills"


"What pills? These are my candies now and I'm keeping them" said Megan swallowing 2 more pills in defiance.


"Are you crazy? Those aren't candy" said Joe rushing to take them from Megan.


She managed to dodge him.


"I told you, they're candy and they're mines now" said Megan.



"Megan, those aren't candy and they haven't been tested yet! They aren't safe" exclaimed Joe, "I'm calling the paramedics hopefully you haven't poisoned yourself." He said finally getting the pill bottle from her unaware or rather forgetting she still had the 2nd missing bottle somewhere.




Just then Joe's friend slash secret crush came in having come over to visit and heard some of the ruckus.

Joe was distracted again.
"A-Anna what brings you over" he asked.


"I heard a commotion and rushed over. While your parents are away I promised to make sure you and Megan don't get too out of hand" said Anna.

They were soon interrupted by Megan.


"I don't feel so good," groaned Megan, "I feel like I'm going to throw up."


"Don't throw up!" exclaimed Joe, "It could make things much worse."


"I can't keep it in," she said, hunching over. Megan's body tensed and spasmed and oddly vibrated a little . She stayed bent over for a few seconds, trembling, then straightened up. "I feel better now," she said, "actually, I feel good... Like really good... The best I've ever felt."



"At least you didn't throw up," said Joe, "and the pills don't seem to be harmful, but they didn't...," he trailed off as he looked at his sister.


"They didn't what?" asked Anna looking down at Megan, "Wait, is she taller?"


Megan had been short for her age, but as Joe and Anna had noticed, she was growing taller. She quickly passed four feet and kept growing. She'd worn a sweater and sweatpants, which were tightening around her expanding body.

"I feel strange" said the enlarging girl.


Megan's growth continued, rendering Joe and Anna speechless. When the growth ended, Megan stood 7"7 significantly taller than when she had started. Her clothes were quite torn in many places. Whatever wasn't in shreds was incredibly tight and a bit revealing.




"Wow," said Megan excitedly, "no one at school's going to call me short anymore! I'm the tallest kid in my class. I'm the tallest kid in the school. I'm probably the tallest six year old in the world!"



"They worked," whispered Joe.


"What worked?" asked Anna, overhearing his whisper.


"The pills. They were designed to increase the height of the subject and there don't seem to be any harmful side effects," he explained, "I am however more than a little worried given the amount of pills she had that this is all that they did... So far... This is not good"




"Not good? Are you kidding bro? This is great! I hope I get bigger! Maybe I can be bigger than my favorite tv hero GigantaGirl Galactic Space Ranger" said Megan.


"We need to run tests on her and get some of those pills out of her stomach stat" said Joe pulling out his phone.



"No way! If this candy makes you bigger I want more. I want to be the biggest 6 year old, no the biggest girl ever. I wanna be bigger than my favorite hero from my show GinormaGirl" said Megan selfishly.


Next...

Let's try to keep away from aging on this one
-------------------------------------------------------------

"Megan! Megan" she heard her brother call.


The growing 6 year old giantess looked around at the planet shrinking under.

"Huh how can I hear Joe" she asked. Suddenly she felt like she had been poked in her side.


She closed her eyes and seconds later had sat up in bed.

"Huh m-my bed? I-it was just a dream" she said.


"Thank goodness Megan you were having a nightmare during your nap, anyway it's nearly time for breakfast" said her brother. He then went out of the room.


Megan slowly got up. "Wow that quite the dream. I'm being silly though I'm not pudgy I'm quite skinny, still way too short and there's no way candy can fix that"


The 6 year old remembered she still had the 2 jars of "candy" from her brother hidden. She went to the jars only to find something strange. "Wait 4 jars? Did I take 2 more from big brother and forget? Oh well"

Shrugging it off she opened a jar and ate a few candies then hid them again. Breakfast was fairly uneventful.


Megan returned to her room and snuck some more of her stolen "candy" when Joe came in and caught her red handed. Megan swallowed.

"Aha I knew there were some jars missing from my lab. Megan give those back and spit them out now you have no idea what you're eating" said Joe.



"No way you were hiding them from me so it's my candy now" replied Megan defiantly. This time she took an entire handful an ate it in front of him to spite him just as the doorbell rang. It was Anna the girl Joe had a crush on and invented this "candy" for.


As he left the room neither him nor Megan noticed Megan shoot up 3 inches taller. When Joe and Anna returned the scene resumed.


"Megan please that isn't candy and who knows what it'll do to you it hasn't been tested yet"


Megan stuck her tongue out at him and ate a 2nd handful of "candy"

"It has been tasted and it's yummy. I'm keeping my candy" she said popping 2 more pieces into her mouth.


She then started to feel strange. Joe tried to get the jars from her getting Anna involved. "Quick Anna no time to explain but we gotta keep these jars away from Megan it's dangerous and not safe"


It was too late though as something was happening to Megan.

As time past the orbs began to shrink and Megan was aware she was the one getting larger, She no longer needed to eat but wanted to just to know what the planets tasted like. The earth was gone but Megan was now larger than several of the planets, and could see Jupiter as a massive orb. Megan didn't know what would happen next but smiled as she saw everything shrinking around her. "I'm going to be the biggest six year old in the universe." Megan said proudly to herself as she watched Jupiter slowly shrink as she orbited and latched onto the massive gas-giant.


She knew it would only be a matter of time before Jupiter, like earth was a marble sized orb to her. Megan began to giggle as the planet became smaller and smaller.


------ begin edit---

For all she knew other planets would follow and maybe all of space. She was too young to know a lot about space only that it was BIG , bigger even than her supposedly endlessly so. She also certainly had no clue about the multi-Verse theory and that those alternate universes may be just as endless. She might be the first and only being ever to find out unaware that her "candy" had a delayed and accumulative piggy back effect.



For every piece she ate separate sure she wouldn't grow much but eaten together they multiplied each ones effect relative to the prior growth by 3x

Think of it like this if a 3 foot person at 5 candies in a short time

The 1st spurt would put her at 5 feet, the 2nd piggybacking off the 1st would be 15 feet added height ( total height 20 feet at that point ) then add 60 feet ( 80 total ) add 240 feet ( 320 total ) then add 960 feet and boom 5 pills in 1 sitting would make a 1280 Feet giantess.


In Megan's case though she had eaten at least 25 before Joe caught her, a few more after, and then an entire jar that Joe was sure had about 800 pills and each of those pills was going to piggy back off the pill prior to it. Lastly with all the snacking Megan did for all we know she may have consumed more pills and other growth inducing stuff.


1 thing was certain though a final thought by Joe was Megan had so much exposure to the elements that induced growth her DNA Structure likely had changed to a point she can never be shrunk and a normal size 6 year old ever again.

Amy Rodriguez was not only a drop dead gorgeous sixteen year old high school student but she was also the smartest girl in her school. As much as she enjoyed hanging out with her friends, and her boyfriend, Tyler, she loved to be by herself working on her experiments and machines in the confines of her room.


Amy was Mexican-American had long, curly, black hair, a curvy body, C cup breasts and a beautifully angelic face.


One day, Amy was in her room on a Saturday afternoon, she had been working on something that could help people height challenged people or people with stunted growth disabilities overcome that and live a normal average life. Amy looked carefully at three beakers filled with green liquid.



"Almost there, I just hope it gets finished." Amy took a little bit of powder from a small bag and put a large amount into a big cup. She then took her orange liquid and poured them into the powder. To finish it off, Amy took a tiny vial filled with red liquid and slowly poured it into the orange liquid. The beautiful teen then took a spoon and stirred the mixture until it turned a glowing amber like color.


Amy looked closely at the liquid.


"I don't know if it should really be glowing." But then suddenly the it started to bubble and fizz and hiss.


At that moment someone burst into Amy's room. The liquid burst up and splashed onto the unsuspecting girl.

Anna was astonished, "I've heard of miracle gro, but this is ridiculous!" The pink and purple former tiny flower smaller than her index finger was now a good 2 foot taller than her and it's stem was a good 2 feet around.




She was still trying to understand how this happened and then remembered the accident. This brought relief to Anna, since it appeared the stuff was some kind of super plant growth.



As Anna walked away, she hoped no one would mess with the plant, since now she really wanted to see it stay. After a block of walking, she made it to her school. She stopped right at the gate entrance and took a very deep and long breath, "Alright... here I go!" Anna said to herself.




The young girl walked into the school and noticed only a few students were talking to each other while staring at her. This made her worried, but she was honestly expecting this to be much worse. She made her way to the office to make her request for some new dress shoes, but before she could head there, she was stopped by a tall older girl who probably stood a little over 6 foot in shoes,Who's blouse was unbuttoned due to her massive cleavage and her skirt was almost too short for her. She looked cute and like she could be nice if not for her obviously annoyed state right now


https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/74...


Anna didn't know her, but she grew worried and felt a little embarrassed to be standing in front of such a tall large breasted girl.


"Hey you... Anna is it?"



Anna slowly nodded to the older girl's question.


I'm Alyssa Collins and you're the one who got my little sisters phone taken away from her, didn't you?" She asked.


Collins? Why did that name sound so familiar?



Anna shrugged her shoulders, "I don-don't know..." she replied with worry in her voice.


"Well you did, thanks to your little peep show yesterday." Alyssa explained with an upset tone.


Anna was confused, "What peep show?!" she asked out loud.




"Oh really? You're going to play the, I'm the nice little girl who isn't a slut... please, you make me want to gag with that lie you put on. Just to let you know, if you cross my little sister again or me for that matter I will mess that cute little face of yours. I don't care if you are the youngest slut in school you got that? Do yourself a favor little miss small tits and learn your place in the social food chain or else" Alyssa threatened her.



As the teen walked away, she told Anna

"By the way you're not going to get popular, since the wi-fi at this school is shit and none of the videos were able to be uploaded online. Also all the phones that were taken, had their files deleted. Granted I can't get why ANYONE would be interested in those tiny tits. You should cover those things up instead of trying to flaunt them but I guess they don't make training bras that small" she said as she smirked, feeling proud Anna wasn't going to get the attention she assumed she wanted.



Anna fell to her knees and felt so glad, "I don't believe it, it won't get out. Only the students who saw me will even know that really happened!" Anna said to herself. She felt so happy now, this was the last thing she was worried about and it was gone.
1253111111.title: Continue ( reserved )

12531111111.content:
So basically I think my feet grew and I'm here to get the next size up." Anna giggled awkwardly.




"I-I see, well then. That is great for you, uummm, if you want to talk more about that or something like that. Then be sure to tell me." Samantha smiled with a shy expression.


"Oh-okay, well I will be sure to do that." Anna felt a bit weirded out and after getting her new sized up shoes, she left the office.



While in her first class, she saw Sam step in and was seated in front of her. Anna wasn't sure about Sam now, but tried to remember to not judge folks and that she was the one who saved her. Class went on pretty uneventful, with the few exceptions of glares of anger from the girls, excluding Sam, and of lust from few of the boys and a few girls as well. Some of the students were upset to lose their phones, while the rest where just hoping for a show repeat, but sadly for the other half, that wasn't going to happen, at least not today...




After her first and second class was over, it was now lunch period. Anna choose her usual spot near the windows, since she liked the background and the warm light that peaked above from the sun, but today, clouds were moving by and it looked like a storm was brewing outside. As Anna could see some of the trees blowing from the wind picking up. Anna hoped the storm would pass before school let out.




After staring outside for a little bit, she decided to try and finish her lunch. However suddenly she was interupted by Samantha sitting across from her! This startled Anna, but after realizing who it was, she calmed down.


"He-hey, can I sit here Anna?" Sam asked very sheepishly, "I-I don't really know that many people here at this school and you're really the only person I know so far, that seems to be in the cafeteria at the moment so is that alight?" Sam asked in a shy tone.


Anna swallowed her food, "Sure, I don't mind." she said with a smile.


This brightened Sam's expression as she corrected her glasses, but this happy moment was quickly ruined as some girls stepped behind her and warned Anna that she is into some really weird and perverted stuff. Sam started to blush and sink in her seat. The girls giggled and one of them went on to say, "Yeah she likes things that are big and getting BIGGER and BIGGER!" she giggled.



Little did any of them realize ironically that 3 girls , 1 of them right in front of them and some plant life was on the way to fitting that description. Even Anna for the moment somehow forgot the flower that went from finger sized to person sized and then some.



Then one of them pulled out something a tossed it onto the table. It was a book with a bunch of photos and some drawings. Anna didn't get a good look at it as Sam quickly hid it under herself.





"Don't leave your freak work on your desk next time or next time will share it with everyone!" The girls laughed as they walked off. "Maybe she wants us to show them off?" One of them chuckled out loud as they continued to walk away.



Anna was a little upset, but when she looked over to Sam, she could see she was totally embarrassed by this. Anna was about to comfort her, but Sam grew really upset and rushed off crying with her book in hand. She ran out of the cafeteria crying. Anna stood up pleading with Sam to come back, but she didn't listen and she ran through the double doors. Anna felt really bad for her and decided to pack up her lunch and go after her.





She had about 20 minutes to find her before her next class, so she rushed to look for her. She didn't find her on the first floor and not even on the second floor, but some older students were walking downstairs from the third floor and Anna overheard them talking about a short girl wearing glasses running up to the roof. Anna rushed past them and went up two more floors, passing the third floor and the 4th floor, then finally reaching the roof. She stepped through the door and thought Sam was going to try and do something unspeakable to herself, but thankfully that wasn't the case what so ever.



She found Samantha sitting in the corner against the ten-foot high fence observing the front grounds of the school and parts of the city next to it. Anna slowly walked up to Sam and she could see she was still crying a little. Anna asked her if she could sit next to her and Sam just slowly nodded.


Anna sat next to her and then tried to talk to her, "Hey Sam... I don't know what those girls were talking about, but don't be so upset, we all have things we like, so try not to let them get to you."



Sam quickly responded, "You don't understand! The stuff I'm into is weird, just weird and perverted a-and I hate myself for liking it!" Sam yelled at herself.




Anna grew sad and told her, "Don't say stuff like that, you should never hate yourself! You should be happy about yourself, not ashamed."





Slowly Sam wiped her eyes beneath her glasses and then cracked a smile. She then suddenly hugged Anna, which caught her off guard, but she quickly returned the sentiment.


However as the two enjoyed a friendly hug, Anna began to feel like her whole body was starting to heat up again! She quickly pushed Sam away and before Sam could react, Anna was starting to get drenched in sweat again! As Anna stood she immediately collapsed! Samantha cried out her name and tried to lift her up, as she held on to Anna, she suddenly felt like she was moving all over, but it was very faint and quick.
12531111111.title: Continue ( reserved )

125311111111.content:
Later on, Anna was awoken by a loud crack of thunder. She quickly sat up and found herself in a bed. Anna sighed and knew she must have passed out again, but as she sat up. She noticed it didn't look like her room! She walked up to the window and could see it was storming pretty bad and a torrential downpour outside. It was so bad in fact, she couldn't see outside the window, but just the wall of rain.




Anna was getting a little nervous now, since the room she was in looked like the nurse's office at her school, but it looked more up to date and had more than six beds. She slowly walked over to the entrance of the room and heard someone talking down the hallway in one of the rooms. She creeped into the hallway and made her way down to the next room, but as she walked carefully. She heard something behind her and as she turned she saw that Alyssa girl from before just as a bolt of lightning flashed! She screamed and this in turn caused Alyssa to scream. Anna shielded her face and pleaded with Alyssa to not hit her.




However before she could get a response, she heard Sam's voice asking if her sister was alright?!



"Sis-sister?!" Anna asked herself out loud.


Sam walked up the hallway and saw Anna standing in the hallway with her arms sheilding her face.


"Anna your awake, but wha-what's going on?" Sam asked softly.



Anna started to rub the back of her head, "Uummm, well you see Sam... I kind of threated Anna earlier today at school. I didn't know she was your friend."



Sam approached Alyssa asked her to stop threatening people. Alyssa felt pretty bad now. Anna was surprised by this, since this girl seemed pretty mean, earlier but actually, she seemed pretty nice at the same time somehow. Anna supposed now she was seeing the nice side that matched her appearance.



Sam asked if Anna was alright and she said she was, but then asked where she was. Sam smiled and then replied she was at their mom's clinic and house. Anna was a little confused and then Alyssa explained that their clinic is also attatched to their house as one building basically. This made more sense, but she then remembered that Sam called this very busty brown haired older teen her sister!


https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/74...


"Wait, you two are sisters?" Anna asked.


Sam replied softly, "Yes we are, but she tends to be a little overprotective of me. But she is really nice Anna."


"B-but you two hardly look alike" replied Anna.


https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/74...


"Well you see we are technically only half sisters but my father ran out on mom when I was a baby and I've been Samantha's big sis ever since she was born. Oddly I take after mom mostly though while Sam gets her fathers looks but our mothers brains and work ethic" explained Alyssa.




Anna looked back to Alyssa and she saw her smile. Anna smiled back, but in an awkward response.



"But anyways, my mom said you are okay again, and that you need to start drinking lots of water and to watch how low you let your blood sugar get. She said the tests were inconclusive for some odd reason but she suspects you may have diabetes" Aki explained.



Anna nodded and thanked Sam for helping her again and to tell her mom thanks again as well, but just as Anna bowed and said goodbye, Alyssa stopped her and asked where she was going. Anna apologized and told them she would try to pay them back for the use of the clinic. Alyssa shook her head and said, "That's not what I meant. Surely your not stepping outside in that storm are you?"



She stopped and turned her attention back to Alyssa and Sam. Then she asked what did Alyssa mean. Alyssa went on to explain the storm outside is so bad, that they have shut down several of the roads and streets and there was some flash flooding, she suggested she stay till it passes. Anna heard the wind pick up and back to back thunder claps.




She knew Alyssa was most likely right about this. So she stayed and eventually meant with their mother, and that was when she could see how Alyssa was so busty. As her mother was the same, though Alyssa was at least a cup size bigger. What their mom lacked in cup size vs Alyssa tho she made up for in looks and height. Their mom looked barely old enough to be their mom and like more of an older sister to Alyssa.




Their mother was like Alyssa's Twin except 1 to 2 size smaller breast and she was freaky tall like 7 feet something. Her hair and skin were radiant and more brown if possible than Alyssa's. She had a thin hourglass figure and decent hips to boot. She like Samantha wore glasses.



"Oh so my patient is awake? Are you trying to make an excuse to visit here?" the woman giggled.



Anna blushed in embarrassment and she noticed this, "Oh I am so sorry sweety, I tend to say a lot of things. But I am glad to see your okay again."


She couldn't help but notice Anna gawking a bit. "Ah yes I guess you're a little overwhelmed? I get that reaction from new patients sometimes. Being 7 foot 7 you kind of get used to it" said their mom nervously.

Someone comes into possession of a
magic wand called “The Wand of Modification”
it can and will grant any wishes with
a few catches


Catch # 1 - it only modifies things
for example you can’t wish for something
out of thin air or wish to time travel
BUT you could in theory wish an empty fridge
be fully stocked

You can of course transform things
people are most recommended

Catch # 2 - You can’t directly undo a wish
in the normal sense
for example if you wish for a $5 bill to be a
20 you can’t wish it back to a 5 by
just saying you wish it were a 5 again
but certain wording may bend or
circumvent the limits

Catch # 3 - The wand can’t kill

Catch # 4 - You can’t make exactly identical
wishes. For example if you wish
your fridge full of food you can’t do it again
BUT if it’s a different fridge or if you say half
full it would work. Again wording is key


Now to begin
