Once again Joe sleepily opened his eyes. He groaned a bit then sat up, rubbing his knuckles in eyes, trying to get the sleep out of him. Once sufficiently awake Joe climbed out his bed, pulled on his clothes and packed his books in his bag, for school. He quickly scanned the room to make sure that he didn't forget anything when his eyes fell upon that strange object he had felt earlier, but forgot about. Slowly, he walked over to it wondering what it could have been thinking that it was probably some small gift his girlfriend had left him sometime during the night. She was always doing that - giving him presents randomly, whenever she felt like it. Just one of the many reasons he loved her.

As he reached it he saw a note on it, written in flowing script so as to disguise the handwriting of whoever wrote this. It said:

"Joe,
I know that you are into female growth. I found this in a store, and I just thought of you. I figured you might like so, here you go."

It had no signature, but that was the least of his worries - he was too busy staring in disbelief at the package.

"Could this really be," he thought. No way it just couldn't be. All his life he had hoped that there would some sort of scientific discovery in the field of human growth and then suddenly he his just handed his whole life's dream. This was too good to be true. It had to be a joke. But, he couldn't resist... he just had to open it and see what was inside...


What a start to a Saturday morning


Joe slowly opened the box, analyzing its contents.

Inside were several bottles of pure liquid, each holding about a half pint of formula.
Joe narrowed his eyes, a bit confused.
He picked up one of the bottles and studied it closely

"Growth Formula" it read in cursive, "Only affects females".

Joe scoffed as he looked at the liquid. It appeared no different than ordinary water.
Still though...
His curiosity got the better of him as he thought of the females in the house.

There was his mom, Katherine. She was only about 5'3 and had long red hair with blue eyes. While a little strict sometimes, she was always very loving toward her children, and she and her son had been on good terms for the majority of his life. Recently she had been getting a little emotional, realizing that her son was only a year away from college.

Then there was his little sister Mia. She was 10 years old, with the same hair and eyes of her mother. Playful and energetic, she was prone to getting excited over just about everything. However, at her core she was very gentle and kind, and Mia always looked up to her brother. Joe for his part, had always thought that she had an endearing and adorable attitude, and took care of her when she needed something. Though, he thought, she could be a little annoying at times, the were mostly inseparable.

Joe looked at his alarm clock, and realized he was the first one up.
He walked out of his room and down the stairs, going into the kitchen.

....

After brewing a couple cups of coffee, one for him, one for mom, Joe started to set the table.
He then paused for a second, reaching into his pocket to grab the Growth formula.
He wondered...
12533334211.title: Character set 1

125333342111.content:
As Joe held the Growth formula in his right hand, a thought crossed his mind, "Who would be a good test for this stuff?" It was then he could hear some noises coming from upstairs. It was his little Sister and Mother awakening.

Joe looked around where he could pour the formula in. As he couldn't just flat out ask his little sister to drink some growth juice. But when juice crossed his mind, he then knew where he wanted to pour the contents in. He remembered his little sister loved milk as she wanted to get bigger and mom always told her how milk helps you grow.

So Joe quickly poured a glass of milk and poured a very tiny amount of the Growth Formula into the milk. It temporarily turned pink in color, but quickly faded back into it's natural white color. Just as his little sister and mother stepped into the kitchen! Joe stuffed the vile back into his pocket as he greeted his family, "Hi mom, hi Mia, how did you two sleep?"

With a big yawn, his mom picked up the coffee cup closest to her, "Oh I did well, thank you for asking son. Also thanks for the coffee."

Joe smiled, "Oh it was nothing, just thinking about you."

Mia rubbed her eyes after yawning as well and noticed a glass of milk sitting on the table in front of her. She immediately grew excited and asked her Joe if it was for her. Joe smiled and gave her a nod. Mia grabbed the glass of milk and chugged it down.

"Mia, don't chug. That's rude... plus you didn't thank your bother for pouring you a glass of milk sweety." Katherine explained.

Just as Mia gulped the last drop of milk, she burped softly and apologies for her rude manners and then thanked Joe for pouring her some milk. "No problem little sis, just trying to help you grow." Joe said while trying not to laugh at the last part he said.

Katherine started to cook breakfast as her kids sat at the table awaiting for her to finish cooking bacon, eggs, and a few other common breakfast items. However, while she was cooking. Mia was the only one watching her mother cook. Joe on the other hand was watching his little sister like a hawk. Wondering when or if anything was going to happen to his sister.

After a few minutes,Katherine had finished the first set of breakfast and placed the plate in front of Mia.

"Here you go my little flower." Katherine said softly to her daughter. Mia looked up and thanked her mom, Katherine then looked over to Joe and responded, "Your half will be done shorty my son."

Joe blushed a little, as his mom's voice was always so kind sounding and it embarrassed him a little. But it was just then, as Katherine turned and walked back to the skillets. Joe had noticed Mia seemed to have jolted? He didn't say anything and pretended he was thinking about something. So he watched carefully as his little sister, Mia. Stuffed her face.

And almost like on cue, she jolted again! Only this time, Joe saw it as he thought to himself, "Holy cow, did she just grow a small bit? No way, did it work?"

Joe continued to stare, but after a minute, Mia didn't jolt any more. Joe leaned back in his chair and wondered, "Did I just see what I wanted to see?" His mom suddenly walked over and placed his breakfast in front of him. He looked up and thanked her. His mom leaned in and kissed him on the forehead before returning to the skillet to place her half on the plates. Joe rubbed his forehead and sighed.

Their mother finally was able to come to the table and they all were eating breakfast. However... Joe was about to get his true answer if the stuff worked or not on his little 10-year old sister...

While at the table, all three family members where enjoying their breakfast. However, Joe was about to mix his eggs with his bacon as Mia suddenly bumped the table... Joe looked up and stared at Mia for a bit, but just as he was about to focus back on his breakfast. He saw his little sister experience a noticeable jolt!

"Did... Mia just grow an inch?" Joe question himself in his mind.

Mia sat there at the table and continued to eat. Almost as if she hadn't noticed she grew a whole inch! Joe continued to watch, hopping to see her gain another inch. But instead, he got what he wanted and then some! Mia suddenly grew three inches taller! Joe almost chocked on the food that was already in his mouth and his mom asked if he was alright. Joe cleared his throat and just nodded, "Yeah, sorry I was eating a little too fast."

Katherine smiled and asked him to be more careful. After that, she went back to eating breakfast. Joe started to work on his breakfast as it was starting to get cold. But he watched carefully to see if Mia was going to get any bigger. In the back of his head, he hopped it wasn't over, but in a deep part, he feared what might become...

It wasn't long till Mia suddenly started to expand again and this time, her PJs began to become snug. Mia felt her pants grow tighter around her legs and this caused her to look under the table. As she did this, she noticed her night shirt was lifted up past her waistband.

"Mommy, I think my PJs shrunk on me just now..." Mia complained softly.

Katherine was halfway paying attention to Mia as she was busy trying to look for ads in the newspaper in front of her and the breakfast she was eating. Joe was unsure if he should respond to Mia's comment or pretend if everything was normal. As both options were good. On one hand, he could pretend to ignore his little sister and see where it goes or on the other hand. Acknowledge what is happening and take her to somewhere more private.


(Note: When I say more private. I don't mean anything sexual here. Just to enjoy his little sister becoming a giantess in a more private setting.)


Joe decided to take this show into a more private setting as he wasn't too comfortable to include his mom in this whole thing, at least not yet. So he wanted to enjoy seeing a real life giantess growing right before him. So he got up and cleared his plate into the sink and thanked his mom for the breakfast. She smiled and thanked him for the coffee.

He then made his way over to his little sister and leaned in and whispered, "Let's go to my bedroom Mia." after hearing this, Mia's face lite up as she became excited. She quickly got up and cleared her plate too and kissed Katherine on the cheek as she rushed off to Joe's bedroom. Katherine thanked Mia's kind act, but paused as she thought to herself, "Wait... did Mia look taller?"

Joe followed his little sister to his bedroom and could already tell she looked different as she rushed passed him. However, as she did rush pass him. He couldn't help but question something, "Does it look like she's growing in just more than height?" but he wasn't sure as she was moving pretty fast. Upon entering Joe's bedroom. Mia took a seat onto his bed and looked really excited as she loved spending time with her big brother.

When Joe caught up, he closed the door behind him and asked if Mia would be kind enough to stand for him. Mia nodded and stood. Joe was a little surprised as Mia's PJs had shrunken on her a bit. Joe was taken back as the thought of, "This is real, this is REAL. My little sister is really Growing!" While theses words were racing through Joe's mind.

Mia spoke up and asked, "Hey Big Brother... why do my clothes seems smaller on me?" After hearing this, Joe snapped out of his trance and then wondered, she I tell her or play dumb? Mia spoke up again and asked the same question to Joe.

Joe shook his head and decided he would play dumb, "Huh, your clothes have shrunken? Really, they look fine to me."

After hearing this, Mia started to examine herself and disagreed, "No they're not, they feel tighter and my belly button is showing. So they shrunk or something..." Joe was trying his best to keep a straight face as he didn't want to ruin the element of surprise and wanted Mia to be surprise when she realizes what is actually happening to her.

As the two stood there, Mia begun to start changing once more! Joe quickly focused on Mia and watched with excitement as she started to go through more growth. Her PJs quickly started to stretch and pull in different directions. As more skin was becoming more exposed too. Along the lines or forearms, belly, and calves. Mia watched as her clothes shrunken on her body and was confused as she cried out, "Wha-what's happening!? My clothes, they're shrinking!!"

You find her...


"Shit. Where did she go now?" Joe hissed. Seriously! How did a near 9-foot tall girl just vanish without his noticing? "Mia! Mia, where are you!" he called. This was bad. What if she ran into mom? With that thought in mind, Joe quickly and cautiously began his search of the house.

The first thing he did was make his way downstairs. Since his mom wasn't calling him like last time it was safe to assume that Mia hadn't come her way. But still, better safe than sorry. Joe made his way into the kitchen only to find his mom missing. He raised an eyebrow in confusion before noticing a note on the table.

It didn't take him long to finish it and with that came a sigh of relief. "At least she'll be out of the house for a while." Now back to the search. The first thing Joe did was run back upstairs and check his room. Empty. His next stop was back to his sister's room just in case she returned. Again, empty. He then checked his mom's room only to find it empty as well.

Joe was about to go downstairs to search until he remembered he had yet to check the bathroom. Without thinking or even noticing the light from under the door, he burst through the door. "Mia! Are you in here!"

He was greeted by a loud yelp noise before realizing what he'd just done. Joe's face suddenly turned red as he tried and failed to look away. Mia's expression matched his before forming into an expression he rarely saw on her face. Anger. Here she was trying to go to the bathroom and her brother had just barged in without knocking!

"DON'T YOU KNOW HOW TO KNOCK?! GET OUT!" Mia shouted.

Joe instantly covered his eyes before mutter an apology. "I-I am so sorry. I-It's just you vanished and I was worried something happened... I-"

His ramblings were interrupted by a bar of soap to the face. The sudden impact left him reeling as he fell to the floor clutching his nose.

"OUT!" Mia again yelled in anger and embarrassment.

"Right. Sorry." Joe again apologized before Mia kicked the door shut. He felt both humiliated and stupid. Why did he have to rush in without thinking? Didn't his mother always tell him to look before he leapt? Now Mia was upset with him and at that size she could actually hurt him if she were angry enough, not that he thought she would.

Joe hung his head and sighed. This was a complete and utter mess. He needed to do something for her to make it right. Perhaps if he found her some new clothes to ear she'd be less upset. The only problem was there was nothing in the house that would fit her. Plus there was the looming threat that she might grow again.

"Well, I'm nothing if not resourceful." With that in mind Joe made his way back to his room pulled off his bedsheets. They were clothes, but they were long enough that if he cut a few holes, Mia could wear them like a dress. "Yeah, this could work."

Joe grabbed a set of scissors from his nightstand and cut three wholes in his sheets. Hopefully he got the sizes right. Now all he could do was wait until Mia got back. He just hoped she wasn't still too mad at him when she got out. All he could do was hope an apology and new dress did the trick.

With that in mind, Joe waited... and heard the bathroom door open.

———————

The premise is about a device called
“The Matter Transposer”
Basically a glorified size device

——————-
Let's just say you weren't exactly
invited to the science lab at this early
hour of the day, but here you are
amongst the various tables of equipment
and chemicals. You walk on silent
toes while perspiration pools in your pores.



You're unsure how many people could be
in the building already.
There were only a handful of cars in the
parking lot when you pulled in, but that could
easily have increased to pockets full by now.




You know what you are looking for; you've
only been following its theory and progress l
for months on years under Professor Montana.
Miss Rebekah Montana, one of the
youngest, brightest physics professors
in the country, just twenty-five years old, devoted countless hours and years to this project,
and you were always thrilled to overhear any
information about it.



The unbelievable "matter transposer",
a device that could alter the size of any object or
person it contacted.
It should be here, in this very college laboratory.
Through your piecing together of the puzzle,
the physics of the invention remained unclear,
but every partial hint gave the suggestion
that it is real and that it will work. And there it is!


Resembling sketches the professor failed
to hide from your observant
inspections, the matter transposer rests
on a nearby lab table like any other
ordinary piece of equipment.
How could she leave such a wonder
exposed like this!
Good fortune or fate, it waits for you,
calling you forward.



You stand a moment in awe of what the
oddly small device could do. Any of your
fantasies could be transferred to reality
with this simple, size-changing machine.



The matter transposer presents itself
as a compact, silvery cylinder with several
lights and a miniature display.
A round dial gives the impression of controlling
the power and direction, while a short
handle and trigger creates a
pistol-like form factor.
You take it into your hands.
1253333422321.title: Transposer

12533334223211.content:
With the transposer firmly in hand, you point it at different objects in the room but don't pull the trigger. You glance over the device's parts once again and twist the knob towards what you expect is growth then back towards shrink. An uncertain apprehension stirs inside as you struggle to decide how to manage this first test. The brief clues you've picked up on left you without proof of the matter transposer's actual strength.

You leave the dial slightly towards the reduction setting and aim at a scale on an adjacent table. As you pull the trigger, a slight hum vibrates through the device before a wave of light ripples through the air, engulfing the instrument on contact. The scale is aglow, swallowed by light as a radiant silhouette against the ordinary tabletop, then instant as a switch, the light flicks off and the scale is left half its former size.

"Incredible," the only word your awed breath can whisper as you approach the miniature scale. You reach out to it with tingling fingers and eyes wide with excited anticipation. You press the tiny button to activate it, and the lights come on with a cheerful beep. "And it still works!" An immeasurable smile crosses your cheeks, and you grip the matter transposer confidently. "Time to test this for real."

“Toy tickle! Toy big? Jake Big?”

Rik walked over and picked him up.

“Sorry but the professor isn’t a toy
little guy and you’re still the same” said Rik.


Rebekah looked at Jake with concern
hoping the toddler was truly unaffected and
that the flaws in the Transposer wouldn’t
be an issue.


It was bad enough that rebuilding the
Transposer would take a fair bit of time.
This wasn’t a great start to the morning.


A couple hours later Rik returned distressed.

“Professor we have a problem”

“Yes what is it? I was in the middle of
planning to rebuild my.....


She was cut off when a familiar toddler
walked into the lab only there was one big
difference.
Jake was now 10 feet tall.

“This is the problem professor.
Can you help”

“Jake big?” He questioned.

“Oh dear I was afraid of this”


“Afraid of what professor? How did this happen?
And can we fix Jake before his parents find
out or worse?”


“The Transposer, a device I was working on
it affected him earlier. Worse it may still
be affecting him”


“What do you mean?”


“I’ll explain but we gotta take some stuff
and get him outta here”



They round up some stuff and lead Jake
to the professors home which is surprisingly big.
Apparently inheritance from family.


They get Jake in the backyard just in time.
Jake begins acting strange and his body
trembles a bit.


“Feel weird! Jake big?”

He said before right in front of them he
began to grow diaper and all.
In all of 90 seconds Jake had swelled to
2x his size now standing 20 feet tall.


Jake looked around and giggling spoke.

“Big? Big Jake! Jake Big?”
He began clapping his hands
clearly thinking this was a game and enjoying
it unaware of the gravity of the situation.


“Big! Big! Jake Big! Big big! Big Jake
Big good! Big big”


Fortunately for now all he was doing was
clapping and enjoying his situation.
Also fortunately the professors estate
was away from other houses and had
40 foot walls, with 40 feet or taller
trees lining it and 2 high fences.


Rebekah explained her eccentric aunt
had valued privacy and hoped that
should Jake get bored with his celebration that
the yard, wall, trees, and fences would keep
him in for now.


“So explain things more professor”


“Well the Matter Transposer is a device that
can alter size as you can see.
When you both came in this morning I
was testing it.
I knew it works but it still has flaws”


“Flaws? What sort of flaws”


“Well there’s a stability issue.
I haven’t tested Enlarging anything or
anyone past normal size but Jake’s
condition kind of confirms my fears and hypothesis”


“What fears?”


“The shrinking function... it had a flaw
The person shrunk didn’t just shrink
They kept shrinking in spurts!
I suspected the growth may have the same
flaw”


“Wait you don’t mean...

“I do! If the reduction function did similar
then I fear Jake is going to keep growing
until cured or killed”


This time Rik and Rebekah both pictured
the same image
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/11...

Then picture Jake growing even bigger
than the image in their minds.
Both turned pale.


“I have to rebuild the Transposer since
Jake accidentally broke it earlier
I only hope I can do it before he gets too
big or causes problems”


They look over at the 20 Foot Jake.


“Big big! Jake big! Big! Big Jake! Big good!”


He was still in his own world for now fortunately.

125333342232231.content:
Name: Molly Summers
Age: 5
Normal Height: 3'1"
Normal Weight: 37 lbs
Gender: Female
Description: Kind, gentle,playful,
sometimes clumsy, short + thin
And just generally small for her age
and hates it, and would do anything to get taller. Usually wears her pink swimsuit, even if she is not swimming. Likes spending time with her big sister Tanya, who is a teenager.


—————

Tanya drove her 5 year old sister Molly to the beach, annoyed as he got in the car, just like every Saturday. Every time Molly, in her pink swimsuit, gets out of school for the weekend she asks her parents to go to the beach, to which they usually respond, "Ask Tanya to take you this Saturday." Tanya usually says no at first, to which Molly starts punching her until she agrees.



Thinking about this, Tanya lost focus, and she swerves the car off the road. A sudden drop damaged the steering wheel, which later broke due bumpy terrain not suitable for a sedan. Tanya quickly slammed on the brakes, but it didn't do much due to the downhill terrain. She turns on the parking brake, which only made it worse, as the car started tumbling down the road. Before she could get crushed, Tanya quickly opened the driver-side door and exited, leaving Molly behind in the car.



Tanya quickly ran to her sister's help, but to no avail, as the car crashes into a nuclear
testing facility and laboratory.
She wanted to rescue her, but "No Trespassing" and "Caution: Radioactivity" signs dotted the barb-wire fence that the car cut through. No sign of Molly. Tanya quickly finds the nearest official she could find and tells her the news. "We're already working on it," the official said, "but I think your sister won't be alright."



Hours later workers came out of the power plant with Molly on a gurney, unconscious. Tanya was shocked. "She miraculously survived the crash," Tanya was told. "We treated her for radioactivity, but there may be... side-effects."



Tanya didn't care. She was happy Molly was safe, yet to wake up. Molly looked fine but...


Tanya was relieved that her little sister was okay, but something seemed off about Molly. She seemed... Bigger. Tanya zoned out as she looked down at Molly, who was still sleeping. Molly twitched slightly, and Tanya swallowed as she slowly blew up another
few inches or so, everyone else
too engrossed in the
conversation to notice.


About 20 minutes or so later Tanya notices Molly Twitch again.
To Tanya's shock but confirming what she had seen earlier Molly
swelled another 6 inches.


Molly began to stir.

"Mm where am I? What happened big sis and why are you looking at me like that"


"Quick doctor come here something is happening to my sister
Tanya finally gets their attention.


"Ah good she's regained consciousness. What seems to be the problem then"


"Doctor I'm not sure how but she's growing"


The doctor looked at Tanya like she was insane.


"Of course she's growing she is still a child after all"


"No you dolt I mean actually growing as in something straight out of a movie"


"Alright I'll humor you just to prove a point"


With that he helped Molly up and had her get on a combination digital scale and height checker.

The results shocked every nurse and doctor on Molly's case plus her sister.
As the doctor sat the level on her forehead he was went from the chart to the readout.


"Th-there must be some mistake the readings put her at 4 foot 11 and 51 point 3 pounds
But her medical records indicate she should be 3 foot 1 and 37 pounds"


"See I told you" huffed Tanya


"Wait are you saying I got taller" said Molly excited.
"Huh I feel strange" added Molly.


The medical staff then watched in shock as Molly grew again.
Her bodies proportions stayed mostly the same as she swelled.
The measurer on her head was pushed up inch by inch.


Molly crept larger over the next minute till her height read 5 foot 11 and her weight reading went up
to 57 point 8 pounds.
Oddly her only clothes
that were growing with her was
her pink skirt and her Sky Blue panties.
Her hospital gown was starting to become too small as was her Disney Princess
shirt that ironically read
“Best littlest princess ever”


"Oh my goodness this is insane! We need to figure out the cause and either stop or reverse it"
said the doctor.
125333342232231.title: Molly Situation - reserved -

choices: Stowaway in that big ol delivery van
1253333422322314.content:
Molly listened to the doctors and her sister
discuss her condition.
Molly couldn’t understand it all but there were
bits and pieces that she could.


She knew she was growing and doing so
faster than normal.
That part kinda filled her with some glee.
She wouldn’t have to wait years to be taller.


That was the next thing, Molly knew she
was growing but she felt fine otherwise despite
the medical people’s concerns.


Molly also knew they wanted to stop and
possibly reverse this but Molly liked this.
Molly had wanted to be taller for some time
and this was her chance.


Grown ups got to be tall so why shouldn’t she?
Then Molly’s mind drifts to a couple of movies
and stuff she saw with her sister where someone
grows “super big”


Molly pondered it. It was probably impossible but
what if she got as big as a house?
Office building?
Godzilla?
Was such a thing possible?
Would she want to be that big?


Molly wasn’t sure but she knew one thing.
Selfish, risky as it may be her childish wants
were winning out and right now
Molly didn’t want to stop growing yet.
Molly wasn’t big enough yet!
Most importantly Molly absolutely did not
want this undone.


Again as she made that decision Molly
felt strange.
Molly and the medical staff didn’t quite realize
but Molly’s growth spurts were getting bigger
yet slightly further apart.


It had been 23 minutes 15 seconds since
her last growth but now Molly was
Inching larger and she liked it.


Slowly Molly swells larger, the child sized gown
she was wearing reaching its limits began to tear.
Molly swelled just over a foot this time to
7ft 2 inches her new weight only 63 pounds.


Somehow this growth was slowly starting to
defy even more laws of physics than the
obvious hyper growth. Molly wasn’t getting
as heavy as expected granted that may
change if she achieves building or Godzilla size.


A ripping noise was heard as Molly’s gown
tore in back the strings breaking as
her growth finished for now.


Molly didn’t care.
The now 7 foot plus 5 year old was more
concerned with the task at hand.


Molly waited until everyone was distracted and
snuck out of the hospital room.
Molly was determined to make a run for it
and let this growth have its way.


Molly made it outta the hospital with a few
close calls and needed to figure out where to
go and hide fast.


Meanwhile the doctors examining Molly’s
blood had called Tanya in to give some
results.


They had made a couple discoveries.
Nothing great but a start.
1st and most concerning was that
Molly’s growth which started slow enough
was becoming exponential.
She was growing roughly 20 to 27% larger
with each spurt meaning that each spurt
would be bigger than the last.


Next they had discovered things the likes
of which they’d never seen.
Despite their best efforts Molly still had
traces of radiation in her greater than
normal for most people but also somehow in
her blood were a mix strange chemicals,
unknown and even strange or theoretical
elements.


Her blood and DNA were like something out
of a sci-fi flick or according to one lab
tech he felt like he was watching that show
“The Flash” play out in real life only
instead of dozens of people it was 1 little
or not so little girl affected.


1 thing for sure is something was going
on at that nuclear lab facility other than
what would be expected.


Just then Molly and Tanya’s parents arrived
to get the scoop unaware that
Molly had run away.



Molly meanwhile at 7 ft 2 62 pounds was
deciding on where to run and how to let
her growth run its course.

The door to the truck closed and it took off.
Molly got comfortable and drifted to sleep.
She was unaware that some 20 minutes after
her escape her family and the hospital began
to panic.

Sometime later Molly began to stir.
The truck was in motion somewhere.

Molly was unaware she’d slept thru a few
Growth spurts

9 FT 3

2 men opened the truck unprepared for what

A very large and still growing child.

onlookers her fear subsiding as she was oblivious

She said crawling forward.

The frightened men backed up without a word
as Molly pulled herself from the truck.

She exited and stood her new full height of
25 feet tall an 93 pounds.


It was an odd sight.
Seeing a 25 foot tall 5 year old and made
all the more odd by her only 2 articles
of clothing being a small skirt and panties
that somehow was growing with her.

Her upper body, trim belly, normally scrawny
legs and feet were bare.

Still oddities aside the men could not deny
she was intimidating.

Molly looked at them.

“Well thanks for the ride but I guess now I
hafta walk but laying low might be good too!
I wonder where I even am?”

Before she could finish the men ran into the truck
and raced off not worrying about stuff falling
from the truck.

Molly then uses some sheets as makeshift socks.

125333344.content:
Maybe one of these story set ups?

one day, a god of size who is as bored as you drops his size note, a note book used to alter the size of mortal.

Inside it's cover, a set of rules are written:

How to use:

1. The human whose name get written in the note along with a size will get his size changed to the one written in the note.

2. This note will not take effect unless the writer has the person's face in their mind when writing his/her name. Therefore, people sharing the same name will not be affected.

3. If the duration of the size change is written within the next 10 seconds of writing the person's name and size, it will happen.

4. If a size is not specified beside a name 19 days after the name is written, then the size can not be entered anymore.

5. If a human uses the note, a god of size usually appears in front of him/her within 39 days after he/she uses the note.

6.Gods of size, the original owners of the Size Note, do not do, in principle, anything which will help or prevent the size changes in the note.

7. A god of size has no obligation to completely explain how to use the note or rules which will apply to the human who owns it unless asked.

8. The human who becomes the owner of the Size Note can ask a god of size to shrink or grow the note to an appropriate size for the owner. However, that demand can only be asked 5 times for a single person.

9. Before writing a size, the owner of the note may choose to enter a body part of the targetted person before writing a size in accordance to the part chosen.

10. If the targeted person does not possess the specified body part, the note has no effect.

11. The clothing of the targeted person won't change size with the person unless specified to do so in the note.


It's writing time!

1312.content:
Mandy Smith absolutely loved her life. The 39 year old beauty had a body that most people only dream about, with her long black hair that went down to her round, wide butt, and she had the face of an angel. She married the love of her life when she was young and has been with Roger ever since. The two of them have had two children together. One is Olivia, who is sixteen, and one is Matt, who is ten.

One day Mandy got home after a long day of work, her kids and husband were both at home. When she got to her porch, she noticed a small package at the doorstep. She opened the box and saw a tiny little toy gun.

"The things that my kids will order." Mandy went inside, kissed her husband, set the toy on the kitchen counter, and went on the couch to watch TV. The sexy mom lied down on her back when suddenly she felt a tingling sensation in her body. Mandy didn't know what was happening but she loved this tickling in her body. "This is so weird,what is this feeling?" Little did Mandy know that she was getting smaller and smaller and smaller until she was the size of small doll at only five inches tall.

Mandy stopped shrinking and her tingling feeling disappeared, but then she noticed that the couch was now the size of a football field. "What the hell happened?! Why did the couch get so big? Oh god! I've shrunk! But how?!" Just then Mandy looked up and saw one of her family members holding the little toy. Apparently the "toy" was a shrink ray.

Who shrunk Mandy?

Morning! Morning Sean "how is my beautiful daughter this morning and did you sleep well?" hi dad and I slept fine thanks.

Ryan stopped and realised what Sean just called him... And then Stella showed him the birth certificate and what she found out about there DNA mixing and how Sean is there biological teenage daughter now.

Ryan smiled and said what's with the dad thing... "I just thought it would be easier if I just called you both mom and dad as you are both officially my parents now on paper and genetically.

Ryan handed Sean some juice and a bowl of breakfast and continued to talk but including Sean in it too.

The day carried on as normal or as normal as possible anyway Sean is even getting used to it bit by bit... Plus it's nice having caring parents unlike when he grow up as both his parents were non existent and he didn't have any contact with his family anyway.

That night

They all went out as a family and again it was very nice although Sean had to wear a dress due to some stupid dress code at the restaurant.

But apart from that it was very nice.

From the outside veiw it looked like a family with a well behaved and mannered teenage daughter whom dislikes wearing dresses but she just swallowed her pride for her parents.

After they all got back Sean went to bed as Ryan and Stella chilled downstairs watching Netflix.

"Hi my name is Kyle Evans or rather used to be. Nowadays I go by Kate Evans. I'm your typical girl now woman save the fact I used to be male and I'm an what Anime commonly refers to as a "Neko" "Nekomini" or "CatGirl" come to life... Oh that last part gave you pause? Well you're in luck. That's why I'm here narrating. I'm in the process of writing book 1 of my memoirs now that I'm out of college and working at a publishing company."



So onto the story

It all started back when I was in High School shortly before my sweet 16

You see if you're familiar with the multiverse theory or the theory that there are multiple realities and planes of existence turns out it's true. Now before you worry about me putting that in here most of our scientists and non scientists know about this plus we may edit this our later.


For now let's call my home Earth 2 and yes I may have gotten the idea from that TV show The Flash but hey it works. Anyway we have no idea how many earths there are.



I'm veering off topic tho. Anyway all known earths differ in some way take mine for example 1 difference is magic is real here.


I'm not talkin dungeons and dragons, Harry Potter/Hogwarts , unicorns type stuff but definitely a magic of sorts.

Well onto the story


••••••••••••

[ years ago ]



I sat in the office of my MP , Dr. Walton. She is my family’s Magical Practitioner as well as my clinical Psychologist. The title of MP often carried with it a master’s degree on psychology.


The job of an MP is similar to a doctor, except that all or most of his or in this case her patients are those maliciously affected by magic, usually by an accident in their own performance of a spell. Since magical problems can also lead to mental issues or coping with an unwanted physical transformation, knowledge of psychology came in handy.


Sometimes like in my case there were patients seeking intentional magical change, intervention or cure. Granted the magics we have on this earth are by no means god like cure alls that can do anything but it can do a lot.



However, my issue wasn’t related to a magical accident. My name is Kyle, and I should have been born a girl. Spells did exist to transform my body into a woman but they, among other spells related to “curing” mental illness or certain other things , were securely kept by medical professionals to prevent the accidental creation of more mental patients or other issues.



A transgendered girl like me had to jump through many hoops to be considered for gender reassignment, but today marked a big step.



Today, I was given a spell and components to become a real 100% honest to goodness girl for up to 48 hours should I wish to use the full 48 hours and a reversal kit should I not.


I’d read that this was a crucial point for treatment. Spending up to 2 days as a complete female weeded out those who were merely curious about the other gender from those who really were honest to god transgendered. My instructions were specific: cast the spell on Friday night at the earliest, so that it wouldn’t interfere with school.





Unfortunately, today was Thursday. I gratefully accepted the items from Dr. Walton as our appointment ended. This would be a good weekend.
141311.title: TRANS Neko ( reserved )

1413111.content:
The Next Day…

“You really got the spell?” Amy, my best friend, asked. We met when we were 10 or so, and have since been inseparable. She knew about my inner girl. In fact, I didn’t even have to tell her. She just knew. She was very pretty, but just short of gorgeous.



However, with the right clothes and makeup, she was definitely beautiful. She stirred a healthy jealousy within me, mostly because she was female. I didn’t envy her for her blonde hair, however; people always thought she was an idiot, no matter how much she proved them wrong!




Yes,” I said happily, “I can’t wait to cast it tonight!”

“What do you think you’ll look like?”

“I don’t care. I’ll be a girl!” I said.

“Oh, come on, Nikki. You’re already a girl,” Amy pointed out.

I smiled at her use of my real name. “Okay. I’m hoping that I take after Mom.”

Amy smiled. “That’d be sooo evil!”

“I know, right?” I said.


“Just be careful not to mix up the DNA, Nikki,” Amy warned me, “spells that use DNA as a component are more sensitive to mishaps.”



The only components for the spell I had to prepare myself were a lock of hair from both Mom and Dad. That way, I’d be their daughter once the spell took hold.


“I know. The last thing I want to do is turn myself into a freak, girl or not,” I said.


Amy frowned. “They don’t all turn out bad. Remember Cindy? She accidentally combined dog DNA with a temporary beautification spell and didn’t change that much. Not much fur, but she did have to deal with those claws!”




“Yeah. She was lucky. I remember when she had to curb her instinct to chase cats, though. That didn’t look fun at all. Where did she go, anyway?” I asked. I felt bad for dumping all those affected by transformative accidents into one group.



“She moved away after her Dad got a new job in Tuckers County,” Amy said. “I kind of miss her.”



“Yeah. Me too. She took her accident really well, and she was always willing to give the cafeteria food a good sniff to make sure it was edible,” I said.


"Frankly I'm surprised it was edible" I added remembering "Scandinavian Surprise" from food culture month some corporation or other sponsored. I fought the urge to vomit remembering the taste , color and texture.



“She was such a nice girl,” Amy smiled getting back to the subject at hand.


“I hope she’s doing alright,” I said.


“Me too!” Amy chirped.



“Well, I’m going to go on home. I’ve got a big night ahead of me!” I said, smiling widely.



“Make sure to call me when you’re done! I want to hear your real voice!” Amy said.


I nodded my head. “I wouldn’t miss it for the world.”



“I’ll see you later!” Amy chirped.


I waved back at her. “Bye!”




As we parted ways, the only thing on my thoughts was getting home to cast that spell. Oh how I've waited and prayed for this day. Sure magic was a thing but I kind of always wanted to bypass the red tape or better yet wish I had always been female.



With a sigh I remember I would have a wait an hour or two so that I would have more of next afternoon as a girl, but I could compensate by walking home slowly. I accomplished that by taking a detour to a neighbor’s house to say hi to their cat, Belle, who usually wandered around in her front yard. Belle's owner, Mrs. Rosa, appreciated that kids like me took the time to give her cat some company.




Belle had a beautiful coat of fur that was so silver that it was almost white. She was so loving, too! She happily cuddled all over me with a very contented purr, covering my clothes in her silvery fur. I even caught her trying to lick my cheek a few times! Usually I let her, but saliva was one of the most common things that screwed with spells. Blood, however, was the easiest way to have an accident, also the ickiest.




After a few more minutes of cuddling with Belle, I finished walking home. Dad was still at work and wouldn’t be home for a little while, but Mom was in the kitchen, just starting with dinner. After putting my bag in my room, I went to greet her.


“Hi Mom!” I called, giving her a hug.


“Hi Kyle,” she said, “how was school today?”


“It was fun! Amy is happy that I got the spell from Dr. Walton and I’m excited to cast it tonight,” I said.



“Why tonight? Don’t you want all of tomorrow to fit in your 24 to 48 hours?” Mom asked.


I smiled. “I want to go to sleep as a girl so that I can wake up the next morning and just feel… right.”



Mom smiled. “That’s wonderful, sweetie.”


I bounced on my toes. “It will be great! What are you making for dinner tonight?”


“Chicken Parmesan with Bacon, Garlic and herbs. Would you like to help?” she asked.


I bounced again. “I’d love to. Where can I start?”



“You can stir the sauce over there while I cut bread the chicken ,” Mom said. I got right on it, so engrossed in the cooking that I didn’t notice that Dad had come home until he was sharing a kiss with Mom.



“Hi Dad,” I said, cheerfully resuming my work.


“Hey kiddo,” he said, rubbing my head.




“We’re almost done,” I told him.


Dad smiled. “It sure smells good. You two are wonderful cooks.”



Both Mom and I smiled warmly at the compliments and put the finishing touches on dinner.



“Tonight’s the big night?” Dad asked me as we started eating.



“Uh huh,” I nodded.


“Is your plan still the same?” he asked.


I nodded again. “Shopping with Mom and then working on the car with you, right?”


Dad smiled. “As long as the shopping doesn’t go longer than expected, that should be fine.”


Mom laughed. “Are you expecting us to go long, honey?”



“You girls are never on time,” he chuckled.



“We’ll just have to be early, just to spite him. Right, Mom?” I asked.



Mom smiled. “We can try.”


"Well if not at least I get up to 48 hours so there's always Sunday too if all else fails" I added


"That's true" replied mom


Some more jokes were exchanged.
I laughed again. She still wasn’t sure about whether we could keep on schedule or not. I’d have plenty of time for Dad either way, and I could still work with him when I turn back.




It’d just be missing the complete father-daughter dynamic that I so desperately wanted. Time management of the 24 to 48 hours was key. We finished dinner among lighter topics, like how the day was for both Dad and I.



Even after we finished, I waited just a little longer before beginning to prepare the spell. Mom and Dad graciously provided me with some of their hair and admonished me to make sure not to mix anything up.

I smiled as I reassured them that I would be careful. It was early evening when I finally got to my room for the big spell. I had set the components that Dr. Walton had given me on the bed, but I had to arrange them in a circle around me. First, however, I got out of my clothes and made sure that none of Belle's fur was on my body before putting on a pair of panties and a shapeless nightgown. Neither fit me quite correctly, but they would soon!



My eagerness was building.



I neatly arranged the components around me as I studied the scroll more. Pure Sugar, a specific(and secret) combination of spices, my parent’s hair, and a nice pair of earrings fulfilled the requirements of the spell.



Magic was an art that anybody could practice. The issues came with the components. Most spells had at least 1 or 2 expensive, secret, or rare components, and no spell would work without meeting the requirements exactly.



Another good quality to have was a clear voice. If an incantation was spoken incorrectly, nothing would happen. Thankfully, spells these days didn’t blow up in our faces when we mispronounced one word. We could just try again. My voice was clear enough to tackle most spells fairly easily. This one wasn’t too complicated.




Before I began to speak, I made sure all of the components were in place. Nothing seemed to be contaminated, but I couldn’t help but giggle slightly at the grey hairs in Dad’s hair sample.



Satisfied that the spell would work correctly, I began to speak the incantation. They all appeared to be in a different language, but pronouncing the words phonetically worked just fine. As I spoke, I felt a warm glow begin to envelop me. It was starting!



I closed my eyes as I finished the incantation, allowing the warm touch of the changes to dance along my body. I sighed in anticipation as I felt parts of my body shrink and grow into configurations that I should have been developing since I was twelve. The glow felt a little odd toward the end, concentrating on my head and lower back more than I thought it needed to, but I felt great!



…That is.... Until I looked in the mirror. When I opened my eyes and saw myself, I felt my body begin to sway as I fainted dead away.

[ Friday February 29 2006 10:15 PM ]
[ Living Room Couch- Home ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Sex ??? ]
[ Gender TRANS Female ]

“Nicole? Sweetie, are you okay?” a voice said. I felt like I was being held, and a hand stroked my cheek. I felt myself smile at the loving touch, but something else distracted me. The hand smelled like steak! Before I could think, my tongue darted out of my mouth and started to lick it. It tasted like steak, but I also tasted some soap and… Mom?




I stopped in mid lick and snapped my eyes open. I saw Mom laugh softly.


“That tickled,” she said, then regained her composure and looked at me with worry. “Are you okay?”



I sprang up, at a loss for words at first. “I… I think I messed up the spell.”



“Shhh,” Mom said, “you look just fine.”



I wasn’t buying it. I started to cry. “No, I don’t! I have these… ears, and my eyes… and I think I have a tail!”



Mom pulled me into a hug. “You look beautiful, sweetie.”


“I’m a freak!” I cried. Mom gently stroked my back.


“You’ll never be a freak. Okay?” she said resolutely.



I started to calm down in her hug. If Mom seemed this okay with whatever I looked like, maybe I was overreacting. I looked at Mom and she gently smiled again.



“Would you like to see yourself?” she asked.



I shook slightly. “I’m scared.”



“You haven’t changed as much as you think, sweetie,” Mom assured me. She pulled me up off the couch until I was standing next to her in my nightgown.


We walk over to the mirror in the hallway.



I froze when my eyes hit the mirror. My hair was long, down to my shoulder blades, and the top of my head was adorned by two triangular ears, each covered with a layer of fur that matched my hair. My face looked entirely human, but my eyes now had vertical slits and my canine teeth were longer and sharper.


“See? You hardly changed at all,” Mom said.



“My hair is… silver?” I asked, and gasped. “It was Belle!”



“The neighbor’s cat?” Mom asked.



I nodded. I had almost forgotten about the tail I was sure I had, but it started to rise upwards in my excitement, beginning to move my gown upward.



“I was petting her before I got home. Her hair must have gotten mixed up with yours or Dad’s!” I cried.


Mom sighed.


“Do you think that this can be fixed?” I asked.



“I don’t know. The changes are minor and we know who caused them, but…” she started.


“It’s still dangerous,” I finished.




“I’ll call Dr. Walton and see if she can examine you. You should go see your father,” Mom told me.



“Why isn’t Dad here?” I asked then he walked in.


“When you didn’t come downstairs, I came alone in case you decided to cast the spell naked,” he explained. I blushed. "When we realized you'd fainted and why we carefully brought you down here. I was about to get a wet rag for your forehead. You gave your mom and I quite the fright"




“Are you sure it’s okay to stay in this?” I asked sheepishly.



“You’re fine, Kate,” I smiled warmly at the name, “the gown is plenty opaque.”



“Uh, okay,” I said. Mom remained next to me. Dad stood silently. I shied away from his gaze as I felt my ears try to flatten against my head and my tail tuck itself between my legs. When I looked up, he was smiling warmly, with his arms out.



[ Friday February 29 2006 10:22 PM ]
[ Living Room ]

“Why don’t you give your Daddy a hug?” he asked. My eyes went wide. How could he just be so… calm about this? I couldn’t do anything but accept the hug. Tears stung my eyes as he held me.


“I messed up, Dad,” I cried.

“It’ll be okay, Kate ,” he said.



“I… I just wanted to be a girl!” I sobbed, starting to soak Dad’s shirt.


“You are a girl,” Dad said softly, “a beautiful girl.”


“But… what about my—“


“Ears? Eyes? Tail? They’re all beautiful too,” he said.


Mom stepped out as me and dad hugged some more and continued our 1st real father-daughter moment.





I understood what he was doing. If I could learn to appreciate my new features, it would soften the blow if I was told that I couldn’t reverse the accident. I pulled back and looked at Dad. He brushed away my bangs and gently kissed my forehead. I couldn’t help but smile. He patted my head.



“Your mother is probably done with Dr. Walton. Let’s see what she has to say,” he said. I followed along. My tail emerged from between my legs as I walked. Mom smiled when she saw me.



“Dr. Walton will be here soon to examine you,” she said. I started to feel afraid again.



“She's going to think I did this on purpose, isn’t she?” I asked.



“She won’t, sweetie. I told her how you reacted and she believes that it was genuinely accidental,” she said, calming me somewhat.



“What if she says that it’s too risky to fix this?” I asked.


Dad pulled me closer to him. “You’ve hardly changed at all, Kate. You’re human enough to live a normal life.”



I looked down. “I’m sorry that this happened.”



This time, Mom came to comfort me. “It wasn’t your fault, okay? I looked in the hair and saw that only two or three were mixed with your father’s. You thought that he was starting to get grey hairs, didn’t you?”



I nodded as I started to cry again. Dad gently touched my shoulder.



“Hey I’m not that old yet,” he said, in a slightly joking tone. I hugged him again. I wanted to be hugged. I wanted to be loved.



I calmed down as I spent more time in his arms.

I was startled by the doorbell ringing. It seemed so loud now. My tail flicked around wildly until I realized that I had no reason to be scared. Dad took me into the living room as Mom answered the door.


“Good evening, Mrs. Evans,” Dr. Walton said.


“Good evening, Walton, Thank you for coming on such short notice and at this hour,” Mom answered.



“It’s no problem. I try to leave my schedule open when my patients are casting spells,” she said.



“Our daughter is in the living room. I suppose you’d rather she explain things,” she said.




“Of course. Please, lead the way,” he said. A few moments later, I saw the two of them walk into the room. Mom sat next to me, so that I was between both parents, and Dr. Walton moved a chair and sat across from me.


“Hello, Kate,” she said, gaining my attention. She had never called me Kate before.



“Hi, Dr. Walton ,” I said, looking down.



“First, I want to say that I am not upset with you. Accidents happen to the best of us, especially with spells this sensitive,” she started, “I want you to tell me exactly what happened down to every last detail.”



I looked back up. “I spent some time with my neighbor’s cat, Belle, before coming home today. My clothes were covered in her fur. When I was preparing the components, I noticed that two or three silvery hairs were mixed with Dad’s. They looked like grey hairs, so I disregarded them… but they were actually Belle's.”


“I see. What color fur did Belle have?” She asked.


I held a lock of hair up with my hand. “The same color as my hair.”



“So you’ve mixed your DNA with this Belle,” she said. I nodded. “What feline features have you developed?”



“My ears, eyes, teeth, and a tail. I haven’t looked under the gown yet, but I don’t think I’ve grown fur anywhere but my ears and tail,” I explained.



“May I see your hand, please?” She asked. I extended my arm out as he began to examine my fingernails. She tapped a couple of them with her own, as well as with a small metal utensil. Finally, she gently attempted to bend one of them back. I braced for pain, but the nail didn’t budge.




“Your nails are harder than they were, but they aren’t claws. Be careful, though; you can hurt someone if they grow long,” she said.



I was glad that I didn’t have claws. I didn’t want to be able to accidentally hurt someone with a misplaced flex of my hands. “Is this… permanent?” I asked.



Dr. Walton took some components out of the bag she that she came in with and spoke a short incantation. A glow surrounded her hand and enveloped me for a moment. She frowned when it was finished.



“I’m sorry, Kate. This is your natural form now,” she said.



“You can’t remove the cat DNA?” I asked, already knowing the answer.



“You know as well as I do that such operations are successful about 2 times out of every 100. Failure could kill you or make you look far more like an animal. You’ve changed so little that I’d suggest you learn to live with your new features,” she explained.



I frowned. “So there’s nothing we can do?”


“I’m afraid not. However, you did get your wish of becoming a woman.”


“I guess there is a bright side in all this,” I conceded.


“Do you have any questions for me?” She gently prodded.



I had one. “Am I going to start acting like a cat?”


“Have you noticed any odd behavior?” She asked.


“When I first saw myself in a mirror, I fainted. When I woke up, Mom was stroking my cheek and I started to lick her hand because it smelled like steak,” I admitted, blushing.


She nodded. “Is there anything else?”



“I think I, um, have this desire to be touched. Hugs calm me down really easily, and loving contact makes me really happy,” I said.



“So that’s why you had that goofy smile when I kissed your forehead,” Dad said.


“It was like a switch flipped, and I was just happy for a moment,” I admitted.



Dr. Walton smiled. “Just like a domesticated cat, you seem to desire human contact. Here, you’re combining both a human desire and feline desire for such contact. The effect is pronounced here because you love and trust your parents. A stranger shouldn’t be able to affect you as easily until you warm up to him or her.”




“Is there anything else I should be worried about?” I asked.



“I expect that your basic senses are enhanced. You’ll also likely be able to purr if you reach a state of deep relaxation or contentment,” she explained.


“That would be weird,” I said.


“If it happens, it should feel natural,” she explained.



“Will these feline… instincts… change my personality?” I asked.



“They may overwhelm you for a time, and I must stress that you shouldn’t fight your instincts. As time passes, you’ll be able to find equilibrium. Your core personality will not change,” she said.

you have any other concerns?” Dr. Walton asked.

“What’s wrong, sweetie?” Mom asked, noticing my discomfort.


“Can I, um, cuddle up with you?” I pleaded.



“Of course you can,” Mom said, extending an arm for me. I quickly moved behind her outstretched arm, snuggling as close to her as I could manage. I immediately felt better and let out a soft sigh. I hugged myself against her, smiling slightly.




“Isn’t she just adorable?” Mom asked Dad, who had finished putting the movie in.


Adorable? Did I want to be adorable? Well, if feeling this happy meant being adorable, maybe I could live with it.



“She is,” Dad answered, rubbing my head. I closed my eyes and smiled wider.



As the movie started, Mom wormed her arm out from around me and began to gently stroke my head and hair. I stopped trying to pay attention to the movie as I reveled in how nice I was feeling as she continued her loving caresses. A low rumbling sound began to fill the room as I closed my eyes again.



“Hal, listen!” I heard Mom say, “She’s purring!”


I stopped and opened my eyes. “I’m what?”



“You were purring, sweetie,” Mom said, “it was so cute.”


“I didn’t even know I was doing it,” I said, “I just felt so happy where I was…”



Mom started to stroke my hair again and I snuggled deeper into her. This time, I was able to recognize when I started purring. I didn’t have any control over it. I felt so content and happy that it just… happened.




I spent most of the movie in my own happiness, and I didn’t catch much of it. My troubles seemed to melt away as Mom’s love surrounded me. I was feeling really drowsy and relaxed when the credits started to roll. I didn’t resist when I felt myself being lifted away from Mom and up the stairs. Dad placed me in my bed and kissed my forehead.



“Good night, my daughter,” he said. I drifted off to sleep almost as soon as he stopped speaking.
1413111111.title: Continue to Chapter 2B ( reserved )

14131111111.content:
[ Saturday February 29 2006 7:55 AM ]
[ My Bedroom ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Sex (Finally + Permanently )Female ]
[ Gender TRANS Female ]
[ Species ???? ]


“It’s time to wake up, sweetie,” Mom said, gently stroking my cheek.


“Already?” I asked, slowly opening my eyes.


“The spell must have taken a lot out of you. You were practically asleep when that movie ended,” she said softly. As I became more awake, I started to stretch all of my limbs. I let out a small moan.



“That feel nice?” Mom asked.



“Uh huh,” I said. I rolled off my side and yet out a yelp when I rolled over my tail. I had almost forgotten about it. Suddenly, everything that had happened yesterday rushed to my head. My hand shot to my ears.


Mom took the hand I hadn’t raised. “Are you okay?”


I looked down, noticing the very feminine tenting on the front of my nightgown. “I just forgot that I changed yesterday.”



Mom gently stroked my hand and gave me a soft smile. “We’re here for you, okay?”


I nodded. “I think that the shock has worn off. I can handle this, especially since it means I’ll always be your daughter!”



Mom brought me into a hug. “You always were my daughter, even before this happened.”


I was so beyond lucky to have accepting, supporting parents and an accepting bestie.



A tear fell from my eye as I smiled widely. “I love you so much.”



“I love you too, sweetie. Why don’t you get showered and dressed? We still have a day planned,” she said.



My eyes widened. “Oh, we do!”



Mom gave me another worried look. “Are you worried about leaving the house?”



I felt my ears flatten against my head as I nodded. “I won’t be treated badly, will I?”



Mom smiled. “You’ll be fine, sweetie. There are a few idiots or bigots out there, but you won’t be looked down upon for simply making a mistake. Okay?”



I nodded. “Thanks, Mom.”



She smiled again. “I’m going to go prepare us some breakfast. Come down when you’re ready, okay?”



I smiled and nodded. “Okay.”



Before Mom left the room, she turned to me. “Will you have clothes to wear to the mall?”


“They won’t fit perfectly, but I think so. I’ll have to wear a skirt for my tail, but that shouldn’t be a problem!” I grinned.



Mom smiled. “You’ll have some things that fit after today!”




“Definitely,” I agreed. Mom left the room with me on her heels. While she went downstairs, I got a towel and padded to the bathroom. Dropping my insubstantial clothing on the ground, I was finally able to see my fully female form in all of its splendor. I smiled dreamily to myself as my eyes traced the curves I had wished to develop for so many years now.



Except for my ears and tail, I seemed to have grown no fur, but all of my hair was a slivery white that matched Belle's, the effect being that what body hair I did have almost seemed invisible on my fair skin. The thought that I wouldn’t have to shave very often crossed my mind as I started my shower. Still, I shaved anyway, marveling at my smooth skin.



As I dried myself off, my tail became a nuisance due to its ability to take on way too much water, but a hair drier worked well enough on it to dry it off. I was starting to gain greater control over moving it, which I thought would come in handy at the mall. I didn’t want it to randomly flick about and toss my skirt up!




I had already decided that I would wear a longer skirt just in case. Wrapping the towel around my torso, I dashed back to my room and started preparing my outfit. A pair of panties which finally fit the way it was meant to, a bra that was a fair bit too small, and an ordinary skirt and top combo were all I needed. It would be easy for me to change in and out of it to try things on.




Slipping on a pair of flip flops, I watched my tail lightly swish back and forth under the skirt. I wondered if I would be able to fully get used to its presence. I made it downstairs just as Mom was dishing out a classic meal of bacon and eggs.




I gave her and Dad a hug before digging in. My sharper canines ripped through the bacon like nobody’s business, and the eggs were just as wonderful as usual. Mom smiled as I patted a full tummy.


“I see that your tastes haven’t seemed to change,” she said.


“Oh, wait,” I realized, “what if there are things I shouldn’t eat because they’re bad for cats?”



“I can call Dr. Walton... And maybe search up some stuff on Google while you two are gone,” Dad answered, “I’m sure you have nothing to worry about, since you’re much more human than cat.”



“I think so too,” I said, “I’d hate to be unable to eat chocolate or something.”



“Well, we’ll probably eat lunch at the mall this afternoon,” Mom said, “do you have any ideas of what you’ll have?”


“Fish!” I cried out, without thinking. Both Mom and Dad started laughing.



“Maybe your tastes have changed,” Mom chucked. I blushed.


“Maybe they’re not changed, but just added onto,” Dad suggested.



“I suppose we’ll keep finding out new things as the days go by,” I said. Dad gently rubbed my head.



“Remember what Dr. Walton said,” he said, “your new instincts may seem overwhelming at times, but you’re still you.”


I nodded. “I’ll keep that in mind.”


Mom placed her hand on mine. “Is our daughter ready to go shopping?”

I stood up. “Definitely!”


I then hugged my dad goodbye and unintentionally gave him a lick on the cheek. Darn these feline instincts and tendencies

[ Saturday February 29 2006 8:45 AM ]
[ our kitchen / dining room ]

"Are you ready to go Kate" asked mom once more.


"Definitely 100%" I replied enthusiastically


Mom smiled at my enthusiasm. I gave Dad another hug before heading out with her.



“How was last night’s movie?” I asked her as we started on our way.


Mom smiled knowingly. “You didn’t pay much attention?”


I giggled. “I think it was your fault!”


“You were purring so loud that we had to turn the TV up. You were so adorable,” she explained.



“I didn’t think that mere physical contact could feel so… nice,” I said, blushing slightly.



“Just wait until you’re with a nice boy,” Mom continued.


My blush deepened. “Mom!”



She laughed. “I know you’ll be looking at boys more now, sweetie. It’s nothing to be ashamed of.”





“But I’m not going to let someone fondle me just because I like being touched!” I said with conviction.



“Good,” Mom said approvingly. Right about then, we pulled into the mall and got ready to start our expedition.




We quickly learned that my tail would be a large obstacle in getting clothes for my lower half. Both of us would have to practice our sewing in order to cut holes in all of my clothes.




Panties seemed to work fine, though. I was afraid of having to cut through the delicate material. I was becoming increasingly concerned about the cost of everything, and quite curious as to why Mom wanted to talk to a manager at every store. When shopping for a few pairs of shoes, the store was small enough for me to hear Mom whisper that I was a victim of a magical accident… and the manager gave us a discount! I was marveling at my ability to hear a whisper from across a room as clear as day almost as if I were part of the whispered conversation when Mom got my attention.




“How do those fit?” she asked, regarding a pair of four inch pumps I decided to try on a whim.



“They’re so easy to walk in!” I grinned, “It’s almost like I’m more comfortable with my heels up than flat!”



“Feline grace?” Mom chuckled.


“I don’t know,” I said.


“Do you like the shoes?” Mom asked while watching me walk some more. It was so effortless that I wondered why Kate claimed to have so much trouble.



“I like them, but don’t we already have enough? I don’t want to cost too much money…” I said.


“You’re doing fine, sweetie, and we can get the shoes,” Mom assured me.



“Why do you keep talking to the store managers?” I asked, even though I already knew. I wondered if she would even tell me.




“Many businesses give generous discounts to those who require large wardrobe switches as a result of a magical accident. I was just telling them that you were recently transformed into a girl,” she explained.



“So that’s why you aren’t afraid to splurge,” I said.


Mom hugged me. “I would have tried to splurge even if we had to pay 3x full price.”


I sighed into her hug. “Thanks.”


“Now, I think we might be about done here. Why don’t we get some food?” she asked.


“That sounds great,” I said, giving her a smile.


I took Mom’s arm as we started to walk toward the food court. As we walked, I noticed that I was getting some looks, but none of them seemed threatening. Some of the boys even seemed to be checking me out! I smiled at Mom.


“It looks like you were right about my appearance,” I told her.



Mom simply smiled as we got to the food court. True to my outburst this morning, I honed in on the nearest kiosk selling something related to fish and stocked up.



I got a fish sandwich, some popcorn shrimp and tuna melt with bacon and cheddar. I was quite hungry. Luckily mom didn't seem to mind and the teenaged boys working there slipped us a discount, extra fries and shrimp when the boss went into the back.




Mom and I had sat down at a table when we spotted a familiar face. Mrs. Baker caught sight of us, too, and decided to sit with us.



“Hello, Christine!” A familiar elderly woman greeted us.


“Hello, Linda,” Mom happily replied.


“Now, who is this young girl you have with you?” Mrs. Rosa asked.



“This is Kate, my daughter,” Mom said proudly. Meanwhile, I was trying to disappear before Mrs. Rosa realized that I was not only Kyle, but had hair the same color as her Belle.

1413111111111.content:
[ Saturday March 1st 2006 10:45 AM ]
A/N sorry about forgetting to change that last chapters I'll fix it at some point. Y'all get the just tho 😅
[ Oak Park Mall - Food Court - Main Concourse ]

“Oh? I thought Kyle was your only child,” Mrs. Rosa said.



Mom looked at me apologetically, realizing that she had taken an initiative that I probably should have taken instead.


“Um, Mrs. Rosa , I ~am~ Kyle,” I said. "Or at least I used to be. Sorry"



She looked at me up and down, and gasped. “Oh, dear! You had an accident, didn’t you?”



I hoped I could trust her with my secret. “The truth is that the spell was supposed to make me a girl, because I’ve always felt that I was one, even as Kyle… but I accidentally got some of Belle's hair in it, the other day and this happened.”



“Oh, my goodness I’m so sorry dear,” Mrs. Rosa said.



I shook my head. “It’s not your fault. I didn’t have to come and pet Belle yesterday.”



She smiled then pulled me into a hug. It seemed like her Latino-Italian heritage had made her a big hugger at times. "You're such a brave and nice girl, magnífico! Still I'm a so sorry. I make it up to you next visit to my house I'm a make you the best seafood pasta you ever had and I won't take no for an answer"



I smiled and looked back and forth between mom and Mrs. Rosa. "Thanks I appreciate the offer. It's always a pleasure visiting you and Belle"



"Anyway your feelings would explain quite a lot, you always did seem a little detached when we saw each other. You look very nice, dear, even with your gifts from Belle.”



“…Gifts?” I asked.



“Of course. Appearance is such a fickle thing. You’re unique! Promise me that you’ll take pride in yourself. Make an old woman proud.”



“I… well… I’ll try my best,” I said, breaking into a smile.


Mrs. Rosa smiled and started to stand. “Well, I’d best not keep you from your lunch. I hope to see you soon, Kate.”


“I’ll come by next week!” I promised.


As she left and we started eating, I couldn’t help but think about what she said to me… about being unique. I concentrated on the slight movements of my tail and the twitching of my ears as they instinctually moved to hear the sounds around me.



Take pride in myself, she said. I didn’t ask for these “gifts” from Belle, but they were part of me now, weren’t they? Could I ever truly accept these features as part of me? I didn’t know. I leaned against Mom for comfort and began to purr when she hugged me to her side.

Mom and I got back home shortly after our lunch. Dad wasn’t surprised by the many bags we had in tow, but he did question why I seemed happier. I told him about our meeting with Mrs. Rosa and about how my concerns about money were unfounded due to our discounts.




I wanted to start working on the car with him soon, but I knew that wearing a skirt in the garage would be a bad idea, so I had to sew a hole in at least one pair of pants. Mom and I got to work on it right away.



After a bit of experimentation, we were able to create a hole in back that I could open or close with a snap on button, allowing ample room for my tail. Mom continued to work on my clothes as I went to the garage, where I hoped Dad was.


“Dad?” I called out, my voice echoing in the smallish room.


“Over here, Kate,” he called out, “are you ready?”





“Yeah! Mom and I fixed up a pair of jeans so my tail wouldn’t get squished,” I said, approaching him. He looked at it swishing slightly behind me.



“You two did a good job,” he said. I beamed and started to get some gloves on.


We were working on an older Volkswagen Beetle as a father-son project, although I always thought of it as a father-daughter project.



I knew that it wasn’t considered “feminine” to know a lot about cars, but I enjoyed it and liked that I would know how to deal with breakdowns once the car was passed to me. Plus, it let me spend quality time with my Dad! Besides I could still have tomboyish tendencies right? Stereotypes be damned!



We finished the engine today, so it was almost ready to be painted. Since I was going to get my license soon, I figured that we’d finish the car just in time for me to be the first to drive it.


“You did well today,” Dad said as we started to clean up.


“Thanks, Dad. I’m glad that we’re doing this together,” I said, taking off my gloves. I noticed that some oil had gotten on my arm, and my entire body shook as I stopped a sudden urge to lick it.


“Is something wrong?” Dad asked.



“I saw the oil on my arm and almost started to lick it off,” I said.


Dad helped me to quickly wipe it off. “We’re going to have to be careful with that particular instinct,” he said. I nodded in agreement.


“I think I’ll go take another shower, just to make sure everything is off,” I said.


Dad rubbed my head. “That’s a good idea.”



I smiled at the contact and made my way into the house for my second shower. I came out in an ordinary shirt and skirt combo and started to help Mom with dinner. As I was cutting up more steak, I saw Mom look at me oddly.



“Sweetie, why are you standing on your toes?” she asked.



“Huh?” I asked, feeling my heels suddenly hit the floor. “I was standing on my toes?”



Mom nodded. “Were you doing it on purpose?”



I shook my head. “I didn’t even know I was doing it.”



Mom smiled. “I guess we know why you’re so comfortable in heels.”



“Cats walk on their toes, don’t they?” I asked, not completely sure.



“Yes they do, sweetie, and it seems that your body prefers to walk that way, too,” she said.



I sighed. “I’m sure we’ll keep finding more and more of these nuances over the next few days.”



“I wonder if you’ll always land on your feet if you fall?” Mom said with a light tone.



“I don’t plan on testing that one!” I said, causing us both to start laughing. I shared a hug with Mom before going about the rest of the night. Before I knew it it was time for bed. My 1st full day as a 100% honest to goodness female was complete albeit it part cat to boot.
